description_en:
Give your baby's delicate skin the gentle care it deserves with **Huggies Pure Baby Wipes**. Designed to be as gentle as your touch, these wipes are made with 99% pure water and plant-derived fibers to gently clean, refresh, and nourish your baby's sensitive skin.

**Huggies Pure Baby Wipes** are hypoallergenic and free from harsh ingredients like parabens, alcohol, and fragrances, making them perfect for sensitive skin and newborns. Dermatologically tested, they ensure a safe cleansing experience without irritation, providing you with complete peace of mind.

â­ Gentle and safe for sensitive skin.
â­ Made with 99% pure water.
â­ Contains plant-derived natural fibers.
â­ Free from parabens, alcohol, and added fragrances.
â­ Compact and travel-friendly, perfect for diaper bags.
â­ Dermatologically tested for safety.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Huggies Pure Baby Wipes**
â­ Use wipes to gently clean your baby's skin during diaper changes or to wipe their face, hands, and body.
â­ Reseal the pack tightly after each use to keep the wipes moist.
â­ Suitable for daily use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Huggies Pure Baby Wipes**
â­ 99% Pure Water.
â­ Plant-derived fibers.
â­ Gentle cleansing agents.
â­ Free from harsh chemicals and irritants due to its pure formulation.

description_en:
Discover **Huggies** diapers, the perfect solution for your newborn's delicate skin. These premium diapers, specially designed for newborns, offer superior softness and unparalleled comfort from day one.

â­ Featuring unique soft pillows that absorb liquids in seconds, keeping your baby dry and comfortable at all times.
â­ With an innovative waistband pocket, they effectively prevent leaks and protect your little one from wetness, day and night.
â­ The wetness indicator ensures easy identification of when it's time for a diaper change, helping to keep your baby's skin fresh and clean.
â­ Made with porous materials to promote airflow and reduce the risk of diaper rash, ensuring your baby's skin stays healthy and happy.
â­ Easy to pack and portable, they are an essential addition to your baby's diaper bag.

At **Huggies**, we pride ourselves on delivering high-quality products since 1968, focusing on your baby's skin cleanliness, health, and softness.

--- 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Huggies**:
â­ Help the baby lie on a flat surface.
â­ Slowly hold the ankles of the baby and lift the bottom.
â­ Gently push the tape-style diaper below the baby's bottom.
â­ Keep the colored face of the diaper faced upwards to snuggle the diaper perfectly around the baby.
â­ Seal it with the tape of the diaper for optimum fit and comfort.

--- 

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Huggies**:
â­ Super absorbent materials for dryness.
â­ Soft inner layer gentle on the skin.
â­ Breathable outer layer.
â­ Resealable tapes for a perfect fit.
â­ Wetness indicator for timely diaper changes.

description_en:
Provide your baby with the ultimate comfort and protection with **Huggies Extra Care Diapers Size 3 Jumbo Box**. Specially designed for your baby's delicate skin, these diapers feature superior absorbency to keep your baby dry for up to 12 hours. With a flexible stretchy waistband and breathable sides, **Huggies Extra Care Diapers Size 3 Jumbo Box** ensure a perfect fit and freedom of movement for your active little one. Free from fragrances and harsh chemicals like latex and chlorine bleach, they are the ideal choice for sensitive skin and preventing diaper rash. Discover the difference extra care makes for your baby's skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Huggies Extra Care Diapers Size 3 Jumbo Box**:
â­ Help the baby lie on a flat surface.
â­ Slowly hold the ankles of the baby and lift the bottom.
â­ Gently push the tape-style diaper below the baby's bottom.
â­ Keep the colored face of the diaper faced upwards to snuggle the diaper perfectly around the baby.
â­ Seal it with the tape of the diaper for optimum fit and comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Huggies Extra Care Diapers Size 3 Jumbo Box**:
â­ Super absorbent materials for instant absorption and long-lasting dryness.
â­ Three absorbent channels for better wetness distribution and leak prevention.
â­ Flexible stretchy waistband and expandable sides for a comfortable fit and freedom of movement.
â­ Soft, breathable materials to keep skin dry and healthy.
â­ Free from fragrances, latex, and chlorine bleach for gentle care of sensitive skin.

description_en:
Huggies Extra Care Newborn Diapers are the ultimate choice for your little one's delicate skin.

These premium Huggies diapers are specially designed for newborn babies and are gentle enough to be used the day after birth. Dermatologist-approved and crafted with gentle skin care in mind, these **Huggies** diapers offer exceptional comfort and protection for your newborn.

The unique soft pillows in these nappies are designed to absorb liquids in seconds. They keep your baby dry and ensure comfort at all times. No more wetness against the skin, just softness, and protection at every touch.

Forget about messy accidents with these diapers that feature a special waistband pocket. It effectively prevents leakage and protects your baby, ensuring they stay dry and comfortable, day and night.

With the innovative wetness indicator, you can easily tell when it's time for a diaper change. The indicator changes color when wet, providing a signal that helps you keep your baby's skin fresh and clean.

Our **Huggies** nappies are made with a porous material that promotes airflow, reduces the risk of irritation, and keeps your little one's skin healthy and happy.

They are easy to pack and portable, making them an essential addition to your baby's diaper bag or baby care kit. With the Huggies Extra Care Newborn Diapers, you can rest assured knowing you've chosen the best for your precious bundle of joy.

â­ DRYNESS AND COMFORT: Keep your baby dry, comfortable, and protected all through the day.
â­ SKIN CARE: Prioritize skin care with unique soft pillows to absorb liquids in seconds, offering gentle protection and ensuring your baby's skin stays healthy.
â­ WAISTBAND POCKET: Feature a special waistband pocket that effectively prevents leakage and protects your baby, ensuring they stay dry and comfortable.
â­ WETNESS INDICATOR: Feature an innovative wetness indicator that changes color when wet, providing a signal to change your babyâ€™s diaper.
â­ DERMATOLOGIST-TESTED: Have been dermatologist-tested, ensuring that they meet the highest standards of gentle care.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Huggies**
â­ Help the baby lie on a flat surface.
â­ Slowly hold the ankles of the baby and lift the bottom.
â­ Gently push the tape-style diaper below the baby's bottom.
â­ Keep the colored face of the diaper faced upwards to snuggle the diaper perfectly around the baby.
â­ Seal it with the tape of the diaper for optimum fit and comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Huggies**
â­ Breathable materials to promote airflow and reduce the risk of diaper rash.
â­ Ultra-absorbent pillows to maintain skin dryness.
â­ Secure and resealable adhesive tapes.
â­ Visible wetness indicator.
â­ Gentle-on-skin design, dermatologist-tested.

#diapers #huggies #babycare #newborn #moms #newbornbaby #dryness #comfort #sensitiveskin #KSA

description_en:
Experience ultimate comfort and convenience with **Huggies Pants Jumbo Box**. These premium diaper pants are designed for quick and hassle-free changes for your active baby. Enjoy superior dryness and protection thanks to innovative double leak guards and a dry touch layer, ensuring your baby's delicate skin stays healthy and irritation-free. Discover the ultimate comfort and exceptional protection offered by **Huggies Pants Jumbo Box**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Huggies Pants Jumbo Box**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before use.
â­ Prepare a clean, dry space for changing your baby's diaper.
â­ Place the diaper in the correct direction, noting the front and back.
â­ Gently insert your baby's legs and pull the diaper upwards.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Huggies Pants Jumbo Box**:
â­ Fragrance-free.
â­ Latex-free.
â­ Elemental Chlorine-free.
â­ Dry touch layer.
â­ Wetness indicator.
â­ Double leak guards.

title_ar: Ù‡Ø¬ÙŠØ² Ù…Ù‚Ø§Ø³ 3 Ø¹Ø¨ÙˆØ© Ù…ÙŠØ¬Ø§ 76 Ø­ÙØ§Ø¶Ø© (4-9 ÙƒØ¬Ù…)
description_en:
Experience unparalleled comfort for your little one with **Huggies Size 3 Mega Pack**. These diapers are designed to provide your baby's sensitive skin with maximum dryness and protection for up to 12 hours, thanks to superior absorbency technology and three wetness channels that lock away moisture quickly. The flexible waistband ensures a perfect fit, allowing your baby to move freely during playtime or sleep. **Huggies Size 3 Mega Pack** is completely free from fragrances, latex, and chlorine bleach, making it the ideal choice for daily care of your baby's delicate skin and preventing irritation. Each pack contains 76 high-quality diapers for non-stop comfort. Choose **Huggies Size 3 Mega Pack** to ensure your baby stays dry, healthy, and happy.

â­ All-day dryness and comfort.
â­ Superior leak protection for up to 12 hours.
â­ Soft, breathable materials to reduce the risk of diaper rash.
â­ Flexible waistband for comfort and freedom of movement.
â­ Free from fragrances, latex, and chlorine bleach for sensitive skin care.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Huggies Size 3 Mega Pack**
â­ Help the baby lie on a flat surface.
â­ Slowly hold the ankles of the baby and lift the bottom.
â­ Gently push the tape-style diaper below the baby's bottom.
â­ Keep the colored face of the diaper faced upwards to snuggle the diaper perfectly around the baby.
â­ Seal it with the tape of the diaper for optimum fit and comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Huggies Size 3 Mega Pack**
â­ Super absorbent polymers.
â­ Soft, breathable top layer.
â­ Flexible elastic waistband.
â­ Resealable adhesive tabs.
â­ Free from latex, chlorine bleach, and fragrances.

description_en:
Give your baby the ultimate comfort and dryness with **Huggies Extra Care**, specially designed for your baby's delicate skin. These diapers feature superior absorbency for up to 12 hours, thanks to their innovative three-channel system and soft cushions that lock wetness away from your baby's skin. The flexible, stretchy waistband ensures a perfect fit and unparalleled freedom of movement, guaranteeing your baby's comfort during play or sleep. **Huggies Extra Care** is completely free from fragrances, latex, and chlorine bleach, making it the ideal choice for the most sensitive skin, protecting it from any irritation or rash. Each diaper is made with breathable materials to provide maximum ventilation and keep your baby's skin dry and healthy. Enjoy peace of mind with **Huggies Extra Care**, your baby's companion through every stage of their development.

â­ Superior dryness and comfort for up to 12 hours.
â­ Gentle protection for healthy baby skin.
â­ Triple absorbent channels for rapid and effective wetness absorption.
â­ Flexible design with a stretchy waistband for optimal freedom of movement and comfort.
â­ Free from fragrances, latex, and chlorine bleach for sensitive skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Huggies Extra Care**:
â­ Help the baby lie on a flat surface.
â­ Gently hold the baby's ankles and lift their bottom.
â­ Place the tape-style diaper under the baby.
â­ With the colored side facing upwards, wrap the diaper snugly around the baby.
â­ Secure the diaper with the adhesive tabs for a safe and comfortable fit.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Huggies Extra Care**:
â­ Super Absorbent Polymers.
â­ Soft, breathable inner and outer layers.
â­ Stretchy elastic waistband.
â­ Re-sealable adhesive tabs.
â­ Free from fragrances, latex, and chlorine bleach.

title_ar: Ù‡Ø¬ÙŠØ² ÙƒÙ„ÙˆØª Ù…Ù‚Ø§Ø³ 5 Ø¹Ø¨ÙˆØ© Ø¬Ø§Ù…Ø¨Ùˆ (44 ÙƒÙ„ÙˆØª) - Ø±Ø§Ø­Ø© ÙØ§Ø¦Ù‚Ø© ÙˆØ­Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ© Ù…ØªÙƒØ§Ù…Ù„Ø©
description_en:
Experience unparalleled comfort for your baby with the Huggies Pants Size 5 Jumbo Pack, containing 44 pieces. These pants are designed to provide maximum comfort and ease of use for both mothers and babies. Featuring double leak guards and a quick-dry layer, your baby stays dry and protected day and night, ensuring peaceful sleep and peace of mind for you.

**Huggies** Pants are characterized by their easy-to-put-on and take-off design, making diaper changes quick and convenient even for active toddlers. Furthermore, their superior softness and freedom from perfumes, latex, and chlorine make them the ideal choice for your baby's sensitive skin, reducing the risk of irritation and allergies.

Discover the difference with **Huggies** Pants, offering your baby exceptional dryness, comfort, and protection, and accompanying you through every stage of their development with our complete range of baby care products.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Huggies** Pants Size 5 Jumbo Pack:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before starting.
â­ Prepare a dry, warm, and clean area for diaper changing.
â­ Ensure the pant is oriented correctly, noting the front and back.
â­ Gently insert your baby's legs into the leg openings and pull the pant upwards.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Huggies** Pants Size 5 Jumbo Pack:
â­ High-absorption materials for quick and effective absorption.
â­ Soft, perfume-free inner layer for superior comfort.
â­ Breathable outer layer to keep skin dry.
â­ Double leak guards for enhanced protection.
â­ Wetness indicator to signal when a change is needed.
â­ Free from perfumes, latex, and chlorine to reduce the risk of allergies.

#Huggies #Diapers #BabyPants #BabyCare #Size5 #JumboPack #BabyComfort #PeacefulSleep #BabyProducts #SaudiArabia

description_en:
The **Huggies** Extra Care Newborn Diapers are the ultimate choice for your little one's delicate skin. These premium diapers are specially designed for newborns, offering superior softness and gentleness, making them ideal from day one.

Dermatologist-approved and crafted with gentle skin care in mind, these **Huggies** diapers provide exceptional comfort and unparalleled protection for your baby's sensitive skin. The unique soft pillows are designed to absorb liquids in seconds, keeping your baby dry and ensuring comfort at all times. The special waistband pocket effectively prevents leakage, protecting your baby from wetness day and night.

With the innovative wetness indicator, you can easily tell when it's time for a diaper change as it changes color when wet. Made with porous material, **Huggies** diapers promote airflow to reduce the risk of irritation and keep your little one's skin healthy. They are easy to pack and carry, making them an essential part of your baby's essentials.

At **Huggies**, since 1968, we've prioritized keeping your baby's skin clean, healthy, and soft, with innovations in infant care that have helped generations of babies.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Huggies**:
â­ Help the baby lie on a flat surface.
â­ Slowly hold the ankles of the baby and lift the bottom.
â­ Gently push the tape-style diaper below the baby's bottom.
â­ Keep the colored face of the diaper faced upwards to snuggle the diaper perfectly around the baby.
â­ Seal it with the tape of the diaper for optimum fit and comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Huggies**:
â­ Ultra-soft, cotton-like materials.
â­ Fast-absorbing liquid-trapping pillows.
â­ Breathable outer layer for airflow.
â­ Resealable adhesive tabs.
â­ Color-changing wetness indicator.
â­ Elastic waistband with a leakage-prevention pocket.

#HuggiesDiapers #HuggiesNewborn #SkinCare #BabyDryness #UltraSoft #WetnessIndicator #LeakProtection #SaudiBabies #SaudiMoms #BabyEssentials

description_en:
Nourish your little oneâ€™s delicate skin with **Huggies Natural Care Baby Wipes**, enriched with Aloe Vera, offering a touch as gentle as your own. Designed for ultimate care and protection, these wet wipes feature natural ingredients for a soothing and refreshing experience. Aloe Vera, known for its moisturizing and calming properties, ensures every wipe is gentle on your baby's delicate skin.

Crafted with plant-based natural fibers, these wipes are exceptionally soft, providing a gentle touch and effective cleansing without irritation. Free from alcohol, parabens, and phenoxyethanol, **Huggies Natural Care Baby Wipes** ensure no harmful chemicals come into contact with your babyâ€™s sensitive skin, making them the perfect choice for daily care.

Convenient and ideal for on-the-go use, whether at home or out and about. With a legacy of quality and comfort since 1968, **Huggies Natural Care Baby Wipes** have been accompanying generations of babies.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Huggies Natural Care Baby Wipes**:
â­ Open the resealable label to remove a wipe.
â­ Gently wipe and cleanse your baby's skin.
â­ Reseal the label tightly after each use to maintain moisture.
â­ Ideal for diaper changes, hand, and face cleaning.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Huggies Natural Care Baby Wipes**:
â­ 99% Pure Water.
â­ Aloe Vera Gel.
â­ Plant-derived Natural Fibers.
â­ Free from Alcohol, Parabens, and Phenoxyethanol.
â­ Gentle, dermatologist-tested formula.

description_en:
Discover ultimate comfort for your little one with the Huggies Pants Size 4 Jumbo Pack.

Huggies Pants are the perfect solution for easy and practical diaper changes, specially designed to provide maximum comfort for your active baby. **Huggies Pants** feature superior qualities such as double leak guards for extra protection and a dry touch layer that ensures your baby's skin remains soft and dry for hours. The wetness indicator also makes it easy for you to know when it's time for a change, while the cloud-like softness ensures a perfect fit without any discomfort.

At Huggies, we prioritize your baby's safety, which is why **Huggies Pants** are free from perfumes, latex, and chlorine, minimizing the risk of skin irritation. Easy to pack and carry, they are your ideal companion at all times.

â­ Easy to put on and take off for quick and practical diaper changes.
â­ Double leak guards provide extra protection against leaks.
â­ Superior dry touch layer keeps your baby's skin dry and comfortable.
â­ Wetness indicator to alert you when a change is needed.
â­ Free from perfumes, latex, and chlorine for your baby's skin safety.
â­ Ultra-soft and comfortable fit.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Huggies Pants**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before starting.
â­ Prepare a clean and dry place for diaper changes.
â­ Identify the front and back of the diaper.
â­ Gently insert your baby's legs and pull the diaper up.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Huggies Pants**:
â­ Super absorbent materials for guaranteed dryness.
â­ Flexible leak guards.
â­ Soft top layer, gentle on the skin.
â­ Wetness indicator.

description_en:
Discover ultimate convenience with **Huggies Extra Care Pants** Jumbo Box. Designed for effortless wear and removal, **Huggies Extra Care Pants** make diaper changes quick and practical, offering you and your toddler a hassle-free experience. These pants feature double leak guards and a superior dry-touch layer, ensuring your baby's skin stays soft and dry at all times, with a wetness indicator for easy changes. **Huggies Extra Care Pants** are free from perfumes, latex, and chlorine, making them exceptionally gentle on your baby's delicate skin and minimizing the risk of irritation.

â­ Easy to Put On & Take Off: Perfect for active toddlers.
â­ Superior Leak Protection: Thanks to double leak guards.
â­ Dry & Soft Skin: Dry-touch layer ensures your baby's comfort.
â­ Wetness Indicator: Clearly signals when it's time for a change.
â­ Gentle on Skin: Free from perfumes and harmful materials.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Huggies Extra Care Pants**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before starting.
â­ Prepare a clean and dry space for diaper changes.
â­ Ensure the diaper is placed in the correct direction (front and back).
â­ Gently insert your baby's legs and pull the diaper up.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Huggies Extra Care Pants**:
â­ Super absorbent materials for effective moisture absorption.
â­ Soft, skin-friendly top layer.
â­ Double leak guards for extra protection.
â­ Wetness indicator.
â­ Free from perfumes, latex, and chlorine.

shortdescription_en: Huggies Extra Care Pants: Easy to use, superior leak protection, and dry skin for your baby.

title_en: Huggies Extra Care Newborn Diapers - Size 2 (Newborn) - 4-6 Kg - 21 Count
title_ar: Ø­ÙØ§Ø¶Ø§Øª Ù‡Ø¬ÙŠØ² Ù„Ù„Ø¹Ù†Ø§ÙŠØ© Ø§Ù„ÙØ§Ø¦Ù‚Ø© - Ù…Ù‚Ø§Ø³ 2 (Ø­Ø¯ÙŠØ«ÙŠ Ø§Ù„ÙˆÙ„Ø§Ø¯Ø©) - 4-6 ÙƒØ¬Ù… - 21 Ø­ÙØ§Ø¶Ø©
description_en:
Huggies Extra Care Newborn Diapers are the ultimate choice for your little one's delicate skin, specially designed for newborns to provide maximum comfort and protection.

â­ Soft and gentle as silk, perfect for use from the day after birth.
â­ Dermatologist-approved to ensure superior care for your baby's skin.
â­ Unique soft pillows that absorb liquids in seconds, keeping your baby dry and comfortable.
â­ Innovative waistband pocket prevents leakage, offering extra protection and all-day comfort.
â­ Easy-to-use wetness indicator shows when it's time for a diaper change, keeping your baby's skin clean and fresh.
â­ Breathable materials allow your baby's skin to breathe, reducing the risk of rashes and maintaining skin health.
â­ Easy to pack and portable, making them ideal for your baby's diaper bag.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Huggies** Extra Care:
â­ Help the baby lie on a flat surface.
â­ Slowly hold the baby's ankles and lift the bottom.
â­ Gently push the tape-style diaper below the baby's bottom.
â­ Keep the colored side of the diaper facing upwards to snugly fit the diaper around the baby.
â­ Seal it with the diaper's tape for optimum fit and comfort.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Huggies** Extra Care:
â­ High-absorbency materials (e.g., Super Absorbent Polymers)
â­ Soft, skin-friendly inner layer
â­ Breathable outer layer
â­ Refastenable adhesive tabs
â­ Wetness indicator
â­ Leak-guard leg cuffs

title_ar: Ù‡Ø¬ÙŠØ² Ø­ÙØ§Ø¶Ø§Øª Ø³Ø±ÙˆØ§Ù„ Ø£Ø·ÙØ§Ù„ ØµÙ†Ø¯ÙˆÙ‚ Ø¬Ø§Ù…Ø¨Ùˆ Ù…Ù‚Ø§Ø³ 4ØŒ 84 Ù‚Ø·Ø¹Ø©
description_en:
Huggies Pants Jumbo Box Size 4 are the ultimate solution for quick and convenient diaper changes for your toddler, making the diaper changing experience incredibly easy. These premium pants offer unbeatable efficiency and comfort for your active baby, with double leak guards for extra protection and peace of mind, day and night. The dry touch layer ensures your baby stays dry and comfortable, and the wetness indicator changes color to let you know when it's time for a change. Designed with cloud soft comfort and a gentle tummy fit for a snug, secure fit to prevent leakage without discomfort, these culotte diapers are free from perfumes, latex, and elemental chlorine, making them gentle on your child's delicate skin and minimizing the risk of irritation and allergies. Easy to pack and portable, they are an essential addition to your baby bag or baby care kit.

â­ EASY AND CONVENIENT: **Huggies** Pants are incredibly easy to put on and off, allowing for quick and hassle-free dressing and undressing for your active baby.
â­ SKIN CARE: **Huggies** Pants prioritize skin care, offering gentle protection and ensuring your baby's skin stays healthy.
â­ DRYNESS AND COMFORT: With double leak guards and a dry touch layer, these pant style diapers keep your baby dry, comfortable, and protected night and day.
â­ WETNESS INDICATOR: Feature a wetness indicator that signals when it is time for a change.
â­ FREE FROM NASTIES: **Huggies** Pants are free from perfumes, latex, and elemental chlorine, minimizing the risk of irritation and allergies.

description_en:
Nourish your little one's delicate skin with **Huggies Pure Baby Wipes 56 pcs**, designed to be as gentle as your touch. Made with 99% pure water and plant-based fibers, these natural wet wipes effectively clean, refresh, and nourish your baby's sensitive skin. Dermatologically tested, they are free from harsh ingredients like parabens, alcohol, and fragrances, making them a safe and gentle choice for even the most sensitive skin and newborns.

**Huggies Pure Baby Wipes 56 pcs** feature a water-based, eco-friendly formula and exceptional softness that keeps your baby's skin cool and refreshed. Their convenient size makes them your perfect companion wherever you go, whether at home or on the go, ensuring your baby stays clean and fresh. Since 1968, Huggies has been committed to providing the best care for your baby's skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Huggies Pure Baby Wipes 56 pcs**
â­ Gently use the wipes to cleanse your baby's delicate skin during diaper changes, or for cleaning their face, hands, and body.
â­ Ensure the resealable pack is closed tightly after each use to maintain the wipes' moisture.
â­ Ideal for daily use and anytime you need a quick and refreshing clean for your little one.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Huggies Pure Baby Wipes 56 pcs**
â­ 99% Pure Water
â­ Plant-based fibers
â­ Free from parabens
â­ Free from alcohol
â­ Fragrance-free
â­ Hypoallergenic

description_en:
Experience ultimate comfort and convenience for your little one with the **Huggies Pants Size 3 Jumbo Pack**. These diaper pants are designed for quick and easy diaper changes, making your baby's care routine smoother. They feature an absorbent technology that locks away moisture, keeping your baby's skin dry and fresh all day, along with double leak guards for extra protection and your peace of mind. **Huggies** is committed to providing safe and gentle products for your baby's sensitive skin, as they are free from perfumes, latex, and chlorine, reducing the risk of irritation. The jumbo pack offers excellent value and a generous quantity to meet your baby's needs for longer.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Huggies Pants Size 3 Jumbo Pack**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before and after changing the diaper.
â­ Prepare a clean and dry changing area.
â­ Gently insert your baby's legs into the pant openings.
â­ Pull the pant up until it fits snugly and comfortably.
â­ Ensure the double leak guards are properly in place for leak prevention.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Huggies Pants Size 3 Jumbo Pack**:
â­ Soft and dry top layer.
â­ Super absorbent core.
â­ Double leak guards.
â­ Wetness indicator that changes color.
â­ Fragrance, latex, and chlorine-free materials.
â­ Adhesive tape for easy sealing and disposal.

description_en:
Indulge your skin with **Himalaya Aloe Vera Face & Body Moisturizer Gel 300ml**, expertly crafted to soothe, nourish, hydrate, and cool your skin. This exceptional gel harnesses the abundant natural goodness of aloe vera, packed with enzymes, Vitamin A, Vitamin C, and antioxidants. It's perfect for calming irritated skin, combating severe dryness, and naturally slowing down the signs of aging. **Himalaya Aloe Vera Face & Body Moisturizer Gel** is an ideal choice for daily use, leaving your skin feeling refreshed and healthy. Suitable for all skin types, it's also a great relief for sunburnt skin. Make **Himalaya Aloe Vera Face & Body Moisturizer Gel** a part of your daily routine for superior hydration.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Himalaya Aloe Vera Face & Body Moisturizer Gel 300ml**:
â­ Cleanse your face and body thoroughly with water.
â­ Gently pat your skin dry with a soft towel.
â­ Take the required amount of gel and gently massage it in a circular motion on your face and body, from head to toe.
â­ Apply daily for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Himalaya Aloe Vera Face & Body Moisturizer Gel 300ml**:
â­ Natural Aloe Vera Extract.
â­ Permitted Preservative.
â­ Artificial Color.

description_en:
Experience ultimate gentleness and softness with **Himalaya Gentle Baby Shampoo 400 ml**.

This specially formulated shampoo for delicate baby skin is designed to mildly cleanse your baby's hair, leaving it soft, shiny, and delicately fragranced. Enriched with Hibiscus to soothe and moisturize the scalp, and Chickpeas to naturally condition and keep your baby's skin soft.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Himalaya Gentle Baby Shampoo 400 ml**
â­ Wet your baby's hair gently with lukewarm water.
â­ Take a sufficient amount of shampoo in your hands.
â­ Gently massage your baby's scalp and hair until a soft lather is formed.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water until all shampoo residue is removed.
â­ Use daily for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Himalaya Gentle Baby Shampoo 400 ml**
â­ Hibiscus: Soothes, moisturizes, and softens delicate scalps.
â­ Chickpeas: Naturally condition and soften baby's skin.
â­ Free from artificial colors, parabens, soap, silicones, and sulfates.

#BabyShampoo #HimalayaBaby #BabyCare #BabyHair #NaturalProducts #GentleShampoo #Skincare #BabyHygiene #Newborn #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Revitalize your skin with **Himalaya Herbals Neem Face Wash Gel 150 Ml**, the ultimate solution for fighting pimples, controlling excess oil, and purifying pores deeply. Its potent formula is enriched with Turmeric, known for its anti-inflammatory properties that rejuvenate your skin and help prevent marks. This effective wash removes dirt, excess oil, and dark spots, leaving you with purified, healthy skin with a smooth texture after every use. Enjoy visibly clearer and healthier skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Himalaya Herbals Neem Face Wash Gel 150 Ml**:
â­ Wet your face with water.
â­ Take a small amount of the face wash on your fingertips and massage it gently onto your face in circular motions.
â­ Rinse your face thoroughly with water.
â­ Use twice daily for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Himalaya Herbals Neem Face Wash Gel 150 Ml**:
â­ Neem Extract: Renowned for its antibacterial and anti-inflammatory properties, it helps combat acne and purify the skin.
â­ Turmeric Extract: Rich in antioxidants and anti-inflammatory compounds, it soothes the skin and helps reduce redness and blemishes.
â­ Tamarind Extract: Helps to moisturize the skin and provide a smooth feel.
â­ Cucumber Extract: Hydrates and refreshes the skin.

#Himalaya #NeemFaceWash #Neem #HealthySkin #SkinGlow #Skincare #NaturalProducts #SaudiArabia #Jeddah #Riyadh

description_en:
Experience the ultimate skin nourishment with **Himalaya Aloe Vera Face & Body Moisturiser 500ml**. Discover the power of natural Aloe Vera, renowned for its ability to moisturize, soothe, and cool your skin, leaving it feeling refreshed, soft, and supple. This non-sticky, lightweight moisturiser gel is expertly formulated to soothe and hydrate stressed skin, ensuring a soft and revitalized complexion. Our commitment to sustainability is reflected in our 100% recyclable packaging with an easy-to-use pump. **Himalaya Aloe Vera Face & Body Moisturiser 500ml** is dermatologically tested and clinically proven effective on all skin types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Himalaya Aloe Vera Face & Body Moisturiser 500ml**:
â­ Apply gently on cleansed body, face and neck.
â­ Enjoy moisturized, soft and supple skin all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Himalaya Aloe Vera Face & Body Moisturiser 500ml**:
â­ Natural Aloe Vera extract.

description_en:
Introducing **Himalaya Gentle Baby Shampoo** â€“ the perfect choice for your little one's delicate hair. Our specially formulated shampoo offers a tear-free, gentle cleansing experience that leaves your baby's hair soft, shiny, and nourished. Infused with the goodness of Hibiscus to soothe, moisturize, and soften the scalp, it leaves a refreshing, lingering scent. Chickpeas naturally condition and keep your baby's skin soft.ã€‚

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Himalaya Gentle Baby Shampoo**:
â­ Wet your baby's hair gently.
â­ Pour a sufficient amount onto your hands.
â­ Gently massage baby's scalp and hair to lather.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Use daily for best results and continued softness.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Himalaya Gentle Baby Shampoo**:
â­ Hibiscus: Known for its soothing, moisturizing, and softening properties for the scalp.
â­ Chickpeas: Naturally condition and maintain the softness of baby's skin and hair.
â­ Free from artificial colors, parabens, soap, silicones, and sulfates.
â­ Formulated with 94.4% ingredients of natural origin for gentle and safe care.
â­ pH balancing formula to maintain the natural pH level of your baby's delicate skin.

description_en:
Give your baby the ultimate care with **Himalaya Baby Powder**, specially formulated to nourish and moisturize their delicate skin.

â­ **Himalaya Baby Powder** deeply nourishes the skin with natural ingredients like Almond and Olive, leaving it soft and supple.
â­ It replenishes moisture in dry and dehydrated skin while also rejuvenating it, maintaining a healthy and radiant appearance.
â­ Leaves your baby's skin feeling soft, protected, and refreshed all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Himalaya Baby Powder**:
â­ Sprinkle liberally after baby's bath, during nappy changes, and before bedtime to keep the skin dry and comfortable.
â­ Avoid sprinkling the powder over baby's eyes, nose, and mouth to ensure their safety.
â­ Free from Synthetic colors, Parabens, and Phthalates for maximum safety.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Himalaya Baby Powder**:
â­ Almond: Deeply nourishes and moisturizes the skin.
â­ Olive: Protects the skin and provides superior softness.
â­ Gentle formula free from harmful substances.

description_en:
Nurture your baby's delicate skin with **Himalaya Moisturizing Baby Bath**. Our gentle formula, enriched with Olive Oil and Aloe Vera, moisturizes, soothes, and cleanses your baby's skin, leaving it soft and healthy. Designed with a no-tear formula to protect your baby's sensitive eyes, it ensures a pleasant and worry-free bath time. The rich, creamy lather provides extra care, making it the perfect choice for daily gentle cleansing.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Himalaya Moisturizing Baby Bath**

â­ Pour a small amount onto your hands or a wet sponge.
â­ Gently lather onto your baby's skin and rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Use daily for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Himalaya Moisturizing Baby Bath**

â­ Olive Oil: For deep moisturization and maintaining skin softness.
â­ Aloe Vera Extract: To cleanse and soothe sensitive skin.
â­ Milk: To create a rich, creamy lather that leaves skin moisturized.
â­ No-Tear Formula: To protect baby's sensitive eyes.
â­ 100% Herbal Active Ingredients: To support baby's natural skin health.

description_en:
Experience the purest care with **Himalaya Gentle Baby Bath** â€“ an ultra-mild, tear-free formula designed to nurture your baby's delicate skin. Enriched with the goodness of chickpeas, green grams, and fenugreek, this baby bath gently cleanses, nourishes, and soothes the skin, leaving it soft, healthy, and wonderfully fragrant. The no-tear formula ensures a joyful bathing experience, free from irritation. Himalaya understands a mother's desire for natural, safe, and chemical-free products, and this baby bath is crafted with love and nature's finest ingredients. Clinically tested and free from harmful chemicals like parabens, phthalates, and sulfates, it's the perfect choice for your little one's daily skincare routine.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Himalaya Gentle Baby Bath**:
â­ Pour a small amount onto your hands or a wet washcloth.
â­ Gently lather and apply to your baby's skin.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Use daily for optimal skin health.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Himalaya Gentle Baby Bath**:
â­ Chickpeas: Gently cleanses and moisturizes.
â­ Green Gram: Nourishes and soothes the skin.
â­ Fenugreek: Softens and hydrates.
â­ No-tear formula.
â­ Free from parabens, phthalates, and sulfates.

description_en:
Daily dirt, grime, and pollution can leave your skin looking dull and damaged. Introducing the **Himalaya Charcoal Face Mask**, a unique blend of Activated Charcoal Powder and Green Tea to rescue your complexion. This mask works by absorbing oil and dirt from pores, deeply cleansing your skin for a refreshed and purified look.

â­ Effectively removes toxins and impurities.
â­ Purifies skin, leaving it clean and refreshed.
â­ Absorbs excess oil and reduces skin shine.
â­ Gently exfoliates dead skin cells for smooth, clear skin.
â­ Free from SLS/SLES, Parabens, and Phthalates.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Himalaya Charcoal Face Mask**:
Apply an even layer of the mask to cleansed skin, avoiding the eye area. Leave on for 10-15 minutes to dry, then rinse with cold water and gently pat your face dry. Use 2-3 times a week for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Himalaya Charcoal Face Mask**:
â­ Activated Charcoal Powder.
â­ Green Tea.
â­ Coconut Oil.

#Himalaya #CharcoalMask #Skincare #SkinPurification #HealthySkin #Beauty #SaudiArabia #Makeup #Hydration #Glow

description_en:
Experience purified and healthy skin with the **Himalaya Purifying Neem Foaming Face Wash**, expertly crafted to combat impurities and enhance your skin's natural radiance. This purifying cleanser combines the potent benefits of Neem with the soothing properties of Turmeric for a deep and effective cleansing experience. Neem, renowned for its exceptional antibacterial, antiviral, and germicidal properties, works to fight acne and pimples and prevent their recurrence. Turmeric, with its antiseptic and anti-inflammatory qualities, helps calm the skin and even out skin tone, leaving you with refreshed, blemish-free skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Himalaya Purifying Neem Foaming Face Wash**

â­ Wet your face.
â­ Gently massage the foam all over your face in a circular motion, creating a rich lather.
â­ Avoid the delicate eye area.
â­ Rinse your face thoroughly and pat dry gently.
â­ Use twice daily for optimal results.
â­ Suitable for all skin types.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Himalaya Purifying Neem Foaming Face Wash**

â­ Natural Neem Extract.
â­ Natural Turmeric Extract.
â­ 100% Herbal Actives.

#Himalaya #FaceWash #Neem #Turmeric #SkinCare #Acne #HealthySkin #FacialCleanser #NaturalProducts #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience superior softness and natural protection for your baby with **Himalaya Baby Powder**, carefully formulated to nourish and moisturize delicate baby skin.

**Himalaya Baby Powder** features Almond and Olive extracts, which work synergistically to nourish, moisturize, and protect the skin, leaving it feeling exceptionally smooth and soft. This powder helps replenish moisture in dry, dull skin and rejuvenates skin cells, promoting healthy and refreshed skin for your little one.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Himalaya Baby Powder**:
â­ Apply the powder to your baby's body after bath time, during diaper changes, and before bedtime for lasting comfort.
â­ Avoid spraying the powder near your baby's eyes, nose, or mouth.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Himalaya Baby Powder**:
â­ Almond: Nourishes and provides natural protection to the skin.
â­ Olive Oil: Moisturizes the skin and keeps it smooth.

Free from Synthetic colors, Parabens, and Phthalates, ensuring maximum safety for your baby's delicate skin.

#HimalayaBabyPowder #BabyCare #SoftSkin #BabyProducts #Himalaya #SkinMoisture #NaturalProducts #Skincare #Newborns #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Reveal your skin's natural radiance with **Himalaya Clear Complexion Whitening Face Wash**. This powerful formula is designed to deeply cleanse your skin, effectively reducing dark spots and clarifying impurities. Achieve a clear, even-toned, and glowing complexion, revealing your inherent beauty. Enjoy healthier, brighter skin day by day.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Himalaya Clear Complexion Whitening Face Wash**

â­ Wet your face with water.
â­ Apply a small amount of **Himalaya Clear Complexion Whitening Face Wash** and massage gently in circular motions.
â­ Rinse your face thoroughly with water.
â­ Pat your skin dry gently.
â­ Use twice daily, morning and evening, for visibly brighter and clearer skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Himalaya Clear Complexion Whitening Face Wash**

â­ Pomegranate: Rich in antioxidants that help rejuvenate the skin.
â­ Saffron: Known for its skin-whitening and brightening properties.
â­ Liquorice: Helps to even out skin tone and reduce dark spots.
â­ White Dammer: Contributes to purifying the skin and removing impurities.

#Himalaya #FaceWash #SkinWhitening #Skincare #HealthySkin #BeautyProducts #SaudiArabia #SkinLightening #GlowingSkin #NaturalBeauty

Experience ultimate freshness with the **Himalaya Detoxifying Charcoal Face & Body Scrub**, your perfect solution for clear, healthy skin. This scrub is a unique blend of activated Coconut Charcoal powder and Green Tea for a deep purifying experience.

**Integrated Exfoliation Power:**
â­ The detoxifying power of charcoal pulls out dirt, removes impurities, and deep cleanses the skin.
â­ The purifying and antioxidant properties of green tea help absorb excess oil.
â­ 100% Natural Exfoliants gently remove dead skin cells, leaving your skin smooth and clean.
â­ Dermatologically Tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Himalaya Detoxifying Charcoal Face & Body Scrub**:
â­ Apply an adequate amount to wet skin on your face and body, avoiding the eye area.
â­ Massage gently with fingertips in a circular motion for a minute.
â­ Wash off thoroughly and pat dry.
â­ Use 2-3 times a week.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Himalaya Detoxifying Charcoal Face & Body Scrub**:
â­ Activated Coconut Charcoal Powder.
â­ Green Tea.

Discover ultimate comfort with **Himalaya Foot Care Cream**. Specifically formulated to provide effective relief from dry and cracked heels, it softens rough feet, leaving them smooth and supple. Enriched with a potent blend of Sal Tree and Fenugreek, **Himalaya Foot Care Cream** effectively heals cracks and soothes inflamed conditions. Honey and Turmeric contribute their powerful anti-bacterial properties, ensuring your feet remain soft and smooth with regular use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Himalaya Foot Care Cream**:
â­ Wash your feet with lukewarm water and pat dry.
â­ Apply the cream over the affected area twice daily.
â­ Gently rub until the cream is fully absorbed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Himalaya Foot Care Cream**:
â­ Turmeric (Curcuma longa)
â­ Fenugreek (Trigonella foenum-graecum)
â­ Sal Tree (Shorea robusta)
â­ Honey

description_en:
Introducing **Himalaya Nourishing Baby Oil 200 ml**, the perfect companion for your baby's delicate skin. This gentle formula, enriched with the goodness of Olive Oil and Winter Cherry, provides deep moisturization and nourishment, keeping your baby's skin soft, supple, and healthy. **Himalaya Nourishing Baby Oil 200 ml** is ideal for baby massage, promoting relaxation and aiding digestion, especially beneficial for colicky babies. Trust Himalaya's commitment to natural, safe, and effective care for your little one's precious skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Himalaya Nourishing Baby Oil 200 ml**:
â­ Warm a small amount of oil between your palms.
â­ Gently massage the baby oil onto your baby's skin in circular motions.
â­ Best used after bath time for enhanced moisturization.
â­ Can be used for abdominal massage to aid digestion and relieve colic.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Himalaya Nourishing Baby Oil 200 ml**:
â­ Olive Oil: Rich in vitamins and antioxidants for nourishing and moisturizing skin.
â­ Winter Cherry: Known for its soothing and conditioning properties.
â­ Gentle and safe formula for sensitive baby skin.

description_en:
Reveal pure, refreshed skin with the **Himalaya Detoxifying Charcoal & Green Tea Sheet Mask**. Crafted from premium bamboo, this sheet mask perfectly contours to your face for a deep detoxifying experience. Enriched with natural Hyaluronic Acid, it provides intense hydration, while its unique blend of Charcoal and Green Tea effectively absorbs excess oil and removes dirt, leaving your skin revitalized and clear.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Himalaya Detoxifying Charcoal & Green Tea Sheet Mask**:
â­ After cleansing, unfold the mask and apply evenly over your entire face.
â­ Adjust the mask to fit the contours of your face.
â­ Leave it on for 15 minutes to allow the active ingredients to work.
â­ Remove the mask and gently massage to help absorb the remaining formula. Wipe with a cotton pad.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Himalaya Detoxifying Charcoal & Green Tea Sheet Mask**:
â­ Water, Glycerin, Propanediol, Sodium PCA, Phenoxyethanol.
â­ Green Tea Leaf Extract.
â­ Carbomer, Chlorphenesin, Triethylene Glycol, Charcoal Powder.
â­ Sodium Hyaluronate, Polyglyceryl-10 Stearate, Polyglycerin-10.
â­ Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate, Citric Acid, Sodium Dehydroacetate.

#Himalaya #CharcoalMask #GreenTeaMask #SkinDetox #HydratingMask #Skincare #BeautyProducts #SaudiArabia #RadiantSkin #DammamBeauty

description_en:
Achieve clear, radiant skin with the **Himalaya Dark Spot Clearing Turmeric Serum**. This unique serum is formulated with a potent blend of antioxidants, Turmeric, and Licorice phyto-extracts to effectively reduce dark spots and blemishes. Powered by cold-pressed turmeric extract, 2% Niacinamide, and 10% Glycolic Acid, the **Himalaya Dark Spot Clearing Turmeric Serum** works to give your skin a healthy and glowing appearance.

Product Features:
â­ Visibly reduces dark spots, sunspots, and age spots within 1 week.
â­ Improves skin hydration, soothes skin, and enhances the skin's natural barrier function.
â­ Reduces dullness and enhances natural skin radiance.
â­ Light and fast-absorbing serum.
â­ Non-staining formula.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Himalaya Dark Spot Clearing Turmeric Serum**
â­ Apply evenly to clean skin, morning and evening.
â­ Gently massage until fully absorbed.
â­ Use regularly for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Himalaya Dark Spot Clearing Turmeric Serum**
â­ Organically sourced, cold-pressed Turmeric.
â­ 2% Niacinamide.
â­ 10% Glycolic Acid.
â­ Licorice extract.
â­ Free from Parabens and Phthalates.

description_en:
Revitalize your skin with **Himalaya Dark Spot Clearing Turmeric Cream**, an innovative formula harnessing the antioxidant power of Turmeric and Licorice extract for radiant and clear skin. Enriched with 2% Niacinamide and 2% Glycolic Acid, this cream effectively reduces the appearance of dark spots and blemishes in just one week, revealing visibly clear, healthy, and radiant skin. Its light, fast-absorbing texture leaves no residue, making it the perfect solution for dullness and enhancing your skin's brightness while providing superior hydration and soothing, supporting the skin's natural barrier function. Free from parabens and phthalates.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Himalaya Dark Spot Clearing Turmeric Cream**:
â­ Wash your face thoroughly before application.
â­ Apply an adequate amount of cream to clean skin.
â­ Gently massage until fully absorbed.
â­ Use twice daily for best results.
â­ Can be used as a makeup base.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Himalaya Dark Spot Clearing Turmeric Cream**:
â­ Cold Pressed Turmeric Extract (Organically Sourced).
â­ 2% Niacinamide.
â­ 2% Glycolic Acid.
â­ Licorice Extract.
â­ Potent Antioxidants.

#Himalaya #TurmericCream #SkinBrightening #DarkSpots #Skincare #HealthySkin #RadiantSkin #SkinWhitening #SkinHydration #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Nurture your baby's delicate skin with **Himalaya Nourishing Baby Oil 300 ml**, a gentle and effective formula designed for ultimate care. 

Enriched with Olive Oil, known for its deep nourishment, it helps maintain the delicate balance and integrity of your baby's skin. This oil is infused with high-quality ingredients that keep baby's skin nourished, providing excellent moisturization and a safe, gentle touch. 

**Himalaya Nourishing Baby Oil 300 ml** boasts superior moisturizing capabilities. Gentle massage with this oil can also aid in improving digestion, particularly beneficial for babies experiencing colic.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Himalaya Nourishing Baby Oil 300 ml**:
â­ Gently massage a small amount of oil onto your baby's clean, dry skin.
â­ Best used after bath time to lock in moisture.
â­ Can be used for baby massage to help relax muscles and improve circulation.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Himalaya Nourishing Baby Oil 300 ml**:
â­ Olive Oil: For deep moisturization and skin protection.
â­ Winter Cherry: For soothing and conditioning the skin.
â­ Other natural ingredients ensuring gentleness and efficacy.

It contains Sweet Cherry Oil and other nourishing ingredients that protect lips from environmental damage and enhance natural lip color, featuring a moisture-lock formula to keep your lips soft and supple all day long.

âœ¨ **Product Features:**

description_en:
Discover the secret to clear and radiant skin with the **Himalaya Dark Spot Clearing Turmeric Sheet Mask**. This innovative mask is enriched with potent antioxidants and the phyto-extracts of Turmeric and Licorice, effectively reducing dark spots and blemishes. Powered by cold-pressed Turmeric extract, Niacinamide, and Glycolic Acid, it combats free radicals and strengthens your skin's natural barrier, leaving your skin visibly clear, healthy, and radiant.

â­ Visibly reduces dark spots & appearance of pores.
â­ 1 Mask = 1 Week of Hydrating Serum.
â­ With Niacinamide & Glycolic Acid, for a clearer skin instantly.
â­ Made with organically sourced Turmeric and cold pressed Turmeric Extract.
â­ Made with 100% Biodegradable sheet.
â­ Free from Parabens, Phthalate and it is dermatologically tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Himalaya Dark Spot Clearing Turmeric Sheet Mask**:
â­ Open the sachet and carefully unfold the sheet mask.
â­ Apply the mask on a clean, dry face, aligning the eye and lip areas.
â­ Leave on for 15-20 minutes to allow the skin to absorb the active ingredients.
â­ Remove the mask and gently massage any remaining serum into your skin.
â­ Use 2-3 times a week for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Himalaya Dark Spot Clearing Turmeric Sheet Mask**:
â­ Turmeric Extract (Cold Pressed)
â­ Niacinamide
â­ Glycolic Acid
â­ Licorice Extract
â­ Aqua, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, etc.

#Himalaya #TurmericMask #SkinBrightening #Skincare #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah #HealthySkin #SkinGlow #BeautyProducts

The **Himalaya Dark Spot Clearing Turmeric Mask** leverages the potent antioxidant properties of Turmeric and Licorice to combat dark spots and rejuvenate dull skin. It works to draw out deep-seated impurities, leaving you with visibly even-toned, healthy, and radiant skin.

â­ Cleanse your face thoroughly before application.

â­ Leave it on for 10-15 minutes until it dries.
â­ Rinse off thoroughly with lukewarm water.
â­ Use 2-3 times a week for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Himalaya Dark Spot Clearing Turmeric Mask**:
â­ Cold-pressed Turmeric Extract (Organically sourced).
â­ Licorice Extract.
â­ Natural moisturizing and nourishing ingredients.
â­ Free from Parabens, Phthalates, SLS/SLES.
â­ 100% Recyclable Packaging.

description_en:
Indulge your skin with **Himalaya Purifying Neem Face Wash**. This advanced Ayurvedic formula, enriched with the medicinal properties of Neem and the soothing goodness of Turmeric, effectively cleanses the skin, combats acne and pimples, and prevents their recurrence. It features a soap-free gel formula, gentle on the skin, and suitable for all skin types, for both men and women. It leaves your face clear, bright, and glowing.

**Special Offer:**
Enjoy a special offer now with **Himalaya Purifying Neem Face Wash** (150 ml) and get a free Himalaya peel-off face mask with your purchase.

**Product Features:**
â­ Ayurvedic face wash gel with an effective formulation.
â­ Soap-free and alcohol-free, providing a soft and luxurious lather.
â­ Suitable for all skin types: oily, normal, and dry.
â­ Ideal for both men and women.
â­ Contains Neem and Turmeric extracts for superior skin care.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Himalaya Purifying Neem Face Wash**
â­ Moisten your face with lukewarm water.
â­ Squeeze a small amount of the face wash onto your palm.
â­ Gently massage your face in a circular motion to create a lather.
â­ Rinse your face thoroughly with water.
â­ Gently pat your face dry with a soft towel.
â­ You can finish your skincare routine by applying a toner or moisturizer suitable for your skin type.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Himalaya Purifying Neem Face Wash**
â­ Aqua â€“ Water
â­ Coco-Glucoside â€“ From coconut oil and sugar
â­ Decyl Glucoside - From coconut oil and sugar
â­ Vegetable glycerine - From Vegetable oils
â­ Ammonium lauryl sulfate.
â­ Xanthan gum
â­ Citric acid â€“ found in citrus fruits
â­ Origanum Majoranaâ€“ leaf oil (Sweet marjoram)
â­ Neem leaf extract â€“ From Neem leaves
â­ Curcuma longa Turmeric) root oil
â­ Potassium sorbate
â­ 12 fragrance from essential oils
â­ Glucose
â­ Lactoperoxidase

#Himalaya #NeemFaceWash #Skincare #AcneFree #HealthySkin #BeautyProducts #FacialCleanser #SkinCareRoutine #MadeInIndia #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Himalaya Dark Spot Clearing Turmeric Scrub harnesses the power of Turmeric, Licorice, and Natural Cellulose Exfoliants to scrub away dead skin cells, helping fade dark spots. The unique cold pressed extraction method helps preserve the active principles of Turmeric. Together with Licorice, the face scrub reduces dullness and leaves your skin smooth, healthy, and radiant.

â­ Visibly reduces dark spots, exfoliates & improves skin radiance.
â­ Exfoliates dirt and dead skin cells.
â­ Fades away dark spots and revitalizes dull skin.
â­ Leaves your skin bright, healthy, and radiant.
â­ The non-staining scrub is made with organically sourced Turmeric and cold pressed Turmeric Extract.
â­ Made with 100% Natural Exfoliants and the pack is 100% recyclable.
â­ Free from Parabens, Phthalates and SLS/SLES.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Himalaya Dark Spot Clearing Turmeric Scrub**:
â­ Dampen your face and neck with water.
â­ Apply a small amount of scrub and gently massage in circular motions, avoiding the eye area.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Use twice a week.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Himalaya Dark Spot Clearing Turmeric Scrub**:
â­ Turmeric
â­ Licorice
â­ Natural Cellulose Exfoliants
â­ Cold Pressed Turmeric Extract

description_en:
Reveal your skin's natural radiance with **Himalaya Gentle Exfoliating Face Wash**, the perfect solution for effective daily cleansing. This soap-free formula gently exfoliates dead skin cells, leaving your skin feeling refreshed and looking luminous. Natural Apricot granules provide gentle exfoliation, while Neem and Lemon deep cleanse and remove excess oil. Aloe Vera soothes the skin and maintains its natural moisture balance for soft, revitalized, and glowing skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Himalaya Gentle Exfoliating Face Wash**
â­ Moisten your face with water.
â­ Massage a suitable amount of the wash all over your face, avoiding the delicate eye area.
â­ Rinse your face thoroughly with water.
â­ Gently pat your face dry with a clean towel.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Himalaya Gentle Exfoliating Face Wash**
â­ Apricot
â­ Aloe Vera
â­ Neem
â­ Lemon
â­ Red Lentil

#FaceWash #Himalaya #Exfoliating #Skincare #HealthySkin #GlowingSkin #SkinMoisture #BeautyProducts #BeautyCare #DailyCare

description_en:
Experience youthful radiance with the **Himalaya Youthful Radiance Edelweiss & Pomegranate Sheet Mask 30ml**. Crafted from 100% cotton, this ultra-soft sheet mask contours perfectly to your face like a second skin, ensuring maximum comfort and absorption. It deeply nourishes and hydrates with natural Hyaluronic Acid, while Edelweiss plant stem cells combat signs of aging with their potent antioxidant properties. The enriching pomegranate essence helps enhance skin's appearance and restores suppleness, leaving your skin looking refreshed and revitalized.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Himalaya Youthful Radiance Edelweiss & Pomegranate Sheet Mask 30ml**

â­ After cleansing, unfold the mask and apply it evenly over your entire face.
â­ Adjust the mask to fit the contours of your face. Keep it on for 15 minutes.
â­ Remove the mask and gently massage any remaining serum into your skin for absorption. Wipe with a cotton pad to remove excess.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Himalaya Youthful Radiance Edelweiss & Pomegranate Sheet Mask 30ml**

â­ Pomegranate Extract
â­ Edelweiss Plant Stem Cells
â­ Natural Hyaluronic Acid
â­ Water
â­ Glycerin
â­ Propanediol
â­ Sodium PCA
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ Carbomer
â­ Chlorphenesin
â­ Triethylene Glycol
â­ Sodium Hydroxide
â­ Edelweiss Cell Culture
â­ Ranabelli Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract
â­ Potassium Sorbate
â­ Ocimum Basilicum (Basil) Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract
â­ Leontopodium Alpinum Flower Extract
â­ Sodium Hyaluronate
â­ Xanthan Gum
â­ Sodium Benzoate

#Himalaya #SheetMask #Skincare #Pomegranate #Edelweiss #Hydration #AntiAging #YouthfulSkin #FaceCare #SaudiArabia

This mask provides intense hydration with natural Hyaluronic Acid and is enriched with Neem to combat pimples and Tea Tree to control oiliness, leaving your skin clear and refreshed.

description_en:
Reveal your skin's natural radiance with the **Himalaya Saffron & Vitamin C Sheet Mask**, crafted from ultra-soft, 100% cotton that contours to your face like a second skin. Enriched with Saffron and Vitamin C, this mask works to enhance your complexion, providing a natural glow. It also features natural Hyaluronic Acid for intense, deep hydration.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Himalaya Saffron & Vitamin C Sheet Mask**:
â­ After cleansing, unfold the mask and apply evenly to your entire face.
â­ Adjust the mask to fit your facial contours and leave it on for 15 minutes.
â­ Remove the mask and gently massage to allow the formula to be absorbed.
â­ Wipe with a cotton pad to remove any excess.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Himalaya Saffron & Vitamin C Sheet Mask**:
â­ Water, Glycerin, Propanediol, Sodium PCA, Phenoxyethanol.
â­ Saffron Flower Extract, Licorice Root Extract, Carbomer, Chlorphenesin.
â­ Triethylene Glycol, Sodium Hydroxide, Hexyl 3-Glyceryl Ascorbate, Potassium Sorbate.
â­ Sodium Hyaluronate.

#Himalaya #SheetMask #Saffron #VitaminC #GlowingSkin #Skincare #Hydration #NaturalGlow #BeautySaudi #SaudiArabia

description_en:
**Himalaya Lemon & Honey Face Wash 150ml** is a refreshing, soap-free daily use face wash gel. It gently cleanses your face and removes excess oil without over-drying, leaving your skin feeling softer, healthier, and refreshed. Enriched with natural Citron, a powerful astringent and cooling agent that tones your skin, and nourishing Honey that deep cleanses and revitalizes. Experience a brighter, more revitalized complexion with every wash.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Himalaya Lemon & Honey Face Wash 150ml**:
â­ Moisten your face with water.
â­ Gently massage the wash all over your face, avoiding the delicate eye area.
â­ Rinse your face thoroughly with water.
â­ Pat your face dry gently with a soft towel.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Himalaya Lemon & Honey Face Wash 150ml**:
â­ Natural Citron
â­ Honey

description_en:
Experience unparalleled purity with the **Himalaya Purifying Neem Face & Body Scrub**. This powerful scrub, crafted with a unique blend of Neem and Apricot granules, purifies your skin with its antibacterial properties, while 100% Natural Apricot Exfoliants gently slough away dead skin cells and nourish the skin. Dermatologically Tested for your peace of mind.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Himalaya Purifying Neem Face & Body Scrub**:
â­ Apply an adequate amount onto wet skin of the face and body, avoiding the eye area.
â­ Massage gently with fingertips in a circular motion for a minute.
â­ Wash off and pat dry.
â­ Use 2-3 times a week for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Himalaya Purifying Neem Face & Body Scrub**:
â­ Neem Extract.
â­ Apricot Granules.

description_en:
Introducing the **Himalaya Charcoal & Green Tea Detox Scrub**, your ultimate solution for healthy, radiant skin. Infused with charcoal powder and green tea, this scrub works to protect your skin from dirt and pollutants, effectively exfoliating dead skin cells to reduce clogged pores and combat acne. Enjoy a smooth, impurity-free complexion with this unique blend that detoxifies and imparts natural brightness. Coconut extracts deeply moisturize the skin, preventing dryness and leaving your skin hydrated all day.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Himalaya Charcoal & Green Tea Detox Scrub 150 ml**:
â­ Splash a generous amount of water on your face to moisten.
â­ Apply a small amount of the scrub onto your face, avoiding the eye area.
â­ Gently massage your skin in a circular motion for one to two minutes.
â­ Let the scrub settle into your pores for about 10 seconds.
â­ Rinse your face with cool water and pat dry gently.
â­ Use 3 times a week for oily skin, and twice a week for normal skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Himalaya Charcoal & Green Tea Detox Scrub 150 ml**:
â­ Aqua, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Parfum, Phenoxyethanol, Carbomer, Ethylhexylglycerin, Charcoal Powder, Benzyl Alcohol, Sodium Hydroxide, Disodium EDTA, Citral, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool.

#HimalayaScrub #SkinCare #Charcoal #GreenTea #Detox #HealthySkin #GlowingSkin #Moisturizing #FaceScrub #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience ultimate freshness and purity with **Himalaya Purifying Charcoal Face Wash**, an advanced formula designed to rejuvenate your skin. Infused with the power of Coconut Charcoal powder and the goodness of Green Tea, **Himalaya Purifying Charcoal Face Wash** deeply draws out impurities and excess oil, leaving your skin with a healthy glow.

â­ Product Features:
â­ Enriched with a unique blend of Activated Charcoal Powder, Coconut, and Green Tea.
â­ Helps remove dirt and reduce oiliness thanks to the adsorption properties of Coconut Charcoal.
â­ Purifies skin and leaves it refreshed with the antioxidant properties of Green Tea.
â­ Draws out toxins, dirt, and impurities that clog pores for a renewed and clear-looking complexion.
â­ Free from SLS/SLES, Parabens, and Phthalates.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Himalaya Purifying Charcoal Face Wash**:
â­ Moisten your face and neck.
â­ Apply a small amount and gently lather using a circular motion.
â­ Rinse off with water and pat dry.
â­ Use twice daily for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Himalaya Purifying Charcoal Face Wash**:
â­ Activated Charcoal Powder, with Coconut & Green Tea.

Discover the **Himalaya Purifying Neem Scrub for Skin**, your ultimate solution for clear and revitalized skin. This effective scrub works to remove impurities and dead skin cells, while also cleansing excess oil that causes acne and blackheads.

â­ Delivers a clear and flawless complexion.
â­ Helps eliminate blackheads and acne.
â­ Moisturizes the skin, leaving it exceptionally soft.
â­ Leaves your skin feeling fresh and radiant.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Himalaya Purifying Neem Scrub for Skin**:
â­ Apply an adequate amount to damp skin.
â­ Gently massage in circular motions on the face and neck.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.
â­ Pat your skin dry gently.
â­ For best results, use at least once a week.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Himalaya Purifying Neem Scrub for Skin**:
â­ Natural Neem Extract.

description_en:
Experience ultimate freshness with **Himalaya Aloe Vera Face Cleansing Gel**. Specially formulated with the natural goodness of Aloe Vera, this unique gel deeply hydrates and instantly soothes your skin, leaving it silky smooth and refreshed. Enjoy radiant, healthy-looking skin with every use.

â­ Cleanses to give you glowing skin.
â­ Soothes for a refreshed feel.
â­ Hydrates skin, making it soft and smooth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Himalaya Aloe Vera Face Cleansing Gel**:
â­ Apply to a wet face and gently massage in circular motions, avoiding the delicate eye area.
â­ Wash off with water and pat dry.
â­ Use twice daily for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Himalaya Aloe Vera Face Cleansing Gel**:
â­ Aloe Vera: For its soothing and hydrating properties.

description_en:
Nourish your little one with **Humana 3 Probalance** milk, the perfect formula for children aged 1 to 3 years. Made in Germany, this premium milk is entirely non-GMO and features our innovative **ProBalanceâ„¢** complex.

**ProBalanceâ„¢** is our commitment to providing your baby with all essential nutrients in age-appropriate amounts, backed by over 65 years of scientific research and expertise. It supports brain development and cognitive growth with essential fatty acids (DHA & ARA), and provides all necessary vitamins, minerals, and carbohydrates for healthy development. Prebiotics promote gut health, while nucleotides strengthen the immune system.

At Humana, quality and safety come first! Our milkâ€™s journey begins on our farms in Germany, where we conduct up to 600 tests to ensure the highest standards of safety and quality in every can.

â­ **Humana 3 Probalance** milk for children aged 1-3 years.
â­ Non-GMO formula.
â­ Contains essential fatty acids (DHA & ARA) for brain development and cognitive function.
â­ Includes all essential vitamins (A, C, D) and vital minerals.
â­ Nucleotides and Prebiotics to boost the immune system and support gut health.
â­ Enriched with Iron and Calcium for strong bones and teeth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Humana 3 Probalance**:
â­ Wash your hands, bottle, and all parts thoroughly.
â­ Boil the bottle and all parts for 5 minutes and keep them covered.
â­ Boil fresh drinking water for 5 minutes and let it cool to 70Â°C (158Â°F).
â­ Pour approximately half the required amount of water into the sterilized bottle.
â­ Loosely fill the provided measuring scoop and level it off with the back of a knife.
â­ Add the specified amount of milk powder to the water.
â­ Screw the bottle cap on tightly and shake well until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Add the remaining water and shake again.
â­ Cool the formula to drinking temperature (approx. 37Â°C or 98.6Â°F).
â­ Check the temperature on your wrist before feeding.
â­ Close the tin tightly and store in a cool, dry place.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Humana 3 Probalance**:
â­ Demineralised whey powder (from cow's milk).
â­ Vegetable oils (palm, rapeseed, sunflower).
â­ Lactose.
â­ Skimmed cow's milk powder.
â­ Galacto-oligosaccharide (from cow's milk).
â­ Palm kernel fat.
â­ Oil from the microalgae Schizochytrium sp.
â­ Ferrous bisglycinate.
â­ Potassium chloride.
â­ Calcium carbonate.
â­ Choline bitartrate.
â­ Calcium salts of orthophosphoric acid.
â­ Sodium citrate.
â­ Inositol.
â­ Sodium selenate.
â­ L-Tryptophan.
â­ Magnesium carbonate.
â­ L-Tyrosine.
â­ Manganese sulphate.
â­ Vitamin C.
â­ Potassium citrate.
â­ L-Phenylalanine.
â­ Nucleotides (Cytidine 5'-monophosphoric acid, Sodium salts of uridine 5'-phosphoric acid, Adenosine 5'-phosphoric acid, Sodium salts of inosine 5'-phosphoric acid, Sodium salts of guanosine 5'-phosphoric acid).
â­ Taurine.
â­ Potassium iodate.
â­ Vitamin E.
â­ Zinc sulphate.
â­ Vitamin D.
â­ Vitamin A.
â­ Pantothenic acid.
â­ Niacin.
â­ Cupric sulphate.
â­ Biotin.
â­ Thiamin.
â­ Vitamin B6.
â­ Vitamin K.
â­ Folic acid.
â­ Riboflavin.
â­ Vitamin B12.
â­ Contains milk and lactose.

#BabyFormula #Humana #BabyNutrition #InfantCare #KidsFood #HealthyGrowth #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah #Mecca #UAE #Kuwait #Toddler #ImmuneSupport #BabyHealth

description_en:
Elevate your baby's nutrition with **Humana 2 Probalanc** formula, expertly crafted for infants aged 6 to 12 months. Proudly made in Germany, this GMO-free baby milk features the advanced ProBalanceâ„¢ complex. 

ProBalanceâ„¢ is a scientifically developed blend designed to provide your baby with all essential nutrients in age-appropriate amounts, backed by over 65 years of scientific research and experience.

**Humana 2 Probalanc** offers comprehensive support for your baby's growth:
â­ Contains essential fatty acids (DHA & ARA) for cognitive development and brain growth.
â­ Enriched with all essential vitamins and minerals for healthy development.
â­ Includes prebiotics to support gut health and a healthy digestive system.
â­ Fortified with nucleotides to strengthen the immune system.
â­ A rich source of Iron and Calcium for strong bones.

â­ Usage Instructions for **Humana 2 Probalanc**:
â­ Bring the required amount of water to a boil and cool to approximately 70Â°C.
â­ Pour roughly half the boiling water into a clean feeding bottle.
â­ Loosely fill the provided measuring spoon with the formula and level it off.
â­ Add the measured formula to the water, screw the bottle cap on securely, and shake well. Add the remaining water and shake again until fully dissolved.
â­ Cool the formula to feeding temperature (around 37Â°C or body temperature) by holding the bottle under cold running water.

â­ Ingredients of **Humana 2 Probalanc**:
â­ Demineralised whey powder (from cow's milk), Vegetable oil (palm, rapeseed, sunflower), Skimmed cow milk powder, Lactose, Palm kernel fat, Potassium chloride, Calcium salts of orthophosphoric acid, Sodium citrate, Calcium carbonate, Oil from the microalgae Schizochytrium sp., Magnesium carbonate, L-Phenylalanine, L-Tryptophan, L-Tyrosine, Vitamin C, Potassium citrate, Nucleotides (Cytidine 5'-monophosphoric acid, Sodium salts of uridine 5'-phosphoric acid, Adenosine 5'-phosphoric acid, Sodium salts of inosine 5'-phosphoric acid, Sodium salts of guanosine 5'-phosphoric acid), Taurine, Ferrous bisglycinate, Zinc sulphate, Vitamin E, Niacin, Pantothenic acid, Cupric sulphate, Biotin, Thiamin, Manganese sulphate, Vitamin D, Vitamin A, Vitamin B6, Riboflavin, Potassium iodate, Folic acid, Vitamin K, Sodium selenate, Vitamin B12. Contains milk and lactose.

#Humana #BabyFormula #InfantNutrition #Stage2 #BabyHealth #MadeInGermany #NonGMOfood #ProBalance #SaudiBabies #HealthyStart

description_en:
Introducing **Humana 1**, the innovative infant formula meticulously crafted to support your baby's healthy growth from birth to 6 months. Made in Germany, **Humana 1** is GMO-free and features our ProBalanceâ„¢ complex, designed to provide your baby with all essential nutrients in age-adapted amounts, backed by over 65 years of continuous scientific experience and research.

**Humana 1** covers your baby's growing nutritional needs, being rich in essential fatty acids like DHA & ARA for brain and cognitive development, along with vital vitamins, minerals, and carbohydrates for healthy growth. It also contains prebiotics to support gut health and nucleotides to strengthen the immune system.

At Humana, quality and safety are paramount. Our milk originates from our farms in Germany, where we integrate strict safety procedures and conduct up to 600 tests to ensure our products are safe and of the highest quality.

â­ Suitable for infants from birth to 6 months
â­ GMO-Free
â­ Contains essential fatty acids DHA & ARA for brain and nerve cell development
â­ Includes all essential vitamins (A, C, D) and minerals for healthy growth
â­ Fortified with nucleotides to strengthen the immune system
â­ Rich source of Iron and Calcium for strong bone development

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Humana 1**:
â­ Wash the bottle and all its parts to remove milk residue from the previous feed.
â­ Boil the bottle and all its parts for five minutes and keep them covered until use.
â­ Boil drinking water for five minutes and allow it to cool to the appropriate temperature.
â­ Pour the required amount of water into the bottle according to the feeding chart.
â­ Use only the scoop provided in the packaging and level off any excess.
â­ Add the amount specified in the feeding chart.
â­ Shake the bottle until completely dissolved.
â­ Close the tin tightly and store in a cool, dry place, and avoid using a microwave to warm the milk.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Humana 1**:
â­ Demineralised whey powder, Vegetable oil (palm, rapeseed, sunflower), skimmed milk powder, Lactose, Palm kernel fat, Potassium chloride, Calcium salts of orthophosphoric acid, Sodium citrate, Calcium carbonate, Oil from the microalgae Schizochytrium sp., Choline bitartrate, Oil from Mortierella alpina, Magnesium carbonate, L-Phenylalanine, L-Tryptophan, L-Tyrosine, Vitamin C, Potassium citrate, Nucleotides (Cytidine 5â€™-monophosphoric acid, Sodium salts of uridine 5â€™-phosphoric acid, Adenosine 5â€™-phosphoric acid, Sodium salts of inosine 5â€™-phosphoric acid, Sodium salts of guanosine 5â€™-phosphoric acid), Taurine, Ferrous bisglycinate, Zinc sulphate, Vitamin E, Niacin, Pantothenic acid, Cupric sulphate, Biotin, Thiamin, Manganese sulphate, Vitamin D, Vitamin A, Vitamin B6, Riboflavin, Potassium iodate, Folic acid, Vitamin K, Sodium selenate, Vitamin B12. Contains Milk and Lactose.

shortdescription_en: Humana 1: Ideal formula for your baby's healthy growth from birth to 6 months. German quality, GMO-free, with ProBalanceâ„¢.

title_en: Humana 3 Probalance Non-GMO Formula for 1-3 Years, 400g
title_ar: Ù‡ÙŠÙˆÙ…Ø§Ù†Ø§ 3 Ø¨Ø±ÙˆØ¨Ù„Ù†Ø³ ØªØ±ÙƒÙŠØ¨Ø© Ø­Ù„ÙŠØ¨ Ù„Ù„Ø£Ø·ÙØ§Ù„ 1-3 Ø³Ù†ÙˆØ§Øª 400 Ø¬Ù…
description_en:
Discover superior quality with **Humana 3 Probalance**, a comprehensive milk formula expertly crafted for your child's growth and development from 1 to 3 years.

**Humana 3 Probalance** is made in Germany and is GMO-free, featuring our exclusive ProBalanceâ„¢ blend. ProBalanceâ„¢ is our commitment to providing your baby with all essential nutrients in age-appropriate quantities, backed by over 65 years of scientific research and experience.

This formula offers:
â­ Essential fatty acids (DHA & ARA) for brain development and cognitive function.
â­ All essential vitamins and minerals for healthy growth.
â­ Carbohydrates for energy.
â­ Prebiotics to support gut health.
â­ Nucleotides to bolster the immune system.

At Humana, quality and safety are paramount. Our milks undergo up to 600 tests to ensure they are safe and of the highest quality for your little one.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Humana 3 Probalance**
â­ Wash the bottle and all its parts thoroughly.
â­ Boil the bottle and all its parts for five minutes and keep them covered.
â­ Boil drinking water for five minutes and let it cool down.
â­ Pour the cooled boiled water into the bottle according to the feeding chart.
â­ Use only the measuring scoop provided.
â­ Add the amount of powder specified in the feeding chart.
â­ Shake the bottle until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Close the packaging tightly and store it in a cool, dry place.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Humana 3 Probalance**
â­ Demineralised whey powder (from cow's milk).
â­ Vegetable oils (palm, rapeseed, sunflower).
â­ Lactose, skimmed cow's milk powder.
â­ Galacto-oligosaccharide (from cow's milk).
â­ Palm kernel fat.
â­ Oil from the microalgae Schizochytrium sp.
â­ Ferrous bisglycinate, Potassium chloride, Calcium carbonate.
â­ Choline bitartrate, Calcium salts of orthophosphoric acid, Sodium citrate.
â­ Inositol, Sodium selenate, L-Tryptophan.
â­ Magnesium carbonate, L-Tyrosine, Manganese sulphate.
â­ Vitamin C, Potassium citrate, L-Phenylalanine.
â­ Nucleotides (Cytidine 5'-mono-phosphoric acid, Sodium salts of uridine 5'-phosphoric acid, Adenosine 5'-phosphoric acid, Sodium salts of inosine 5'-phosphoric acid, Sodium salts of guanosine 5'-phosphoric acid).
â­ Taurine, Potassium iodate, Vitamin E, Zinc sulphate.
â­ Vitamin D, Vitamin A, Pantothenic acid, Niacin.
â­ Cupric sulphate, Biotin, Thiamin, Vitamin B6, Vitamin K.
â­ Folic acid, Riboflavin, Vitamin B12.
â­ Contains milk and lactose.

description_en:
Give your baby the best start with **Humana 1 Probalance**, an infant formula expertly designed for babies from birth to 6 months. Made in Germany, this high-quality, GMO-free formula features the unique ProBalanceâ„¢ complex, providing all essential nutrients for healthy, balanced growth, backed by decades of scientific research and experience. 

**Humana 1 Probalance** is formulated with:
â­ Essential fatty acids DHA & ARA for brain development and cognitive growth.
â­ All essential nutrients â€“ vitamins, minerals, and carbohydrates for healthy development.
â­ Prebiotics to support gut health.
â­ Nucleotides to strengthen the immune system.
â­ Uncompromising quality and safety, with up to 600 tests ensuring product purity and efficacy.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Humana 1 Probalance**
â­ Wash the bottle and all its parts thoroughly.
â­ Boil them for five minutes and keep them covered.
â­ Boil drinking water for five minutes and allow it to cool.
â­ Pour the required amount of water into the bottle.
â­ Loosely fill the provided measuring scoop and level it off.
â­ Screw the cap on and shake well until completely dissolved.
â­ Close the package tightly and store in a cool, dry place.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Humana 1 Probalance**
â­ Demineralised whey powder, Vegetable oil (palm, rapeseed, sunflower).
â­ Skimmed milk powder, Lactose, Palm kernel fat.
â­ Potassium chloride, Calcium salts of orthophosphoric acid, Sodium citrate, Calcium carbonate.
â­ Oil from microalgae Schizochytrium sp., Choline bitartrate, Oil from Mortierella alpina.
â­ Vitamin C, Potassium citrate, Nucleotides, Taurine, Ferrous bisglycinate.
â­ Zinc sulphate, Vitamin E, Niacin, Pantothenic acid, Cupric sulphate.
â­ Biotin, Thiamin, Manganese sulphate, Vitamins (D, A, B6, Riboflavin, Folic acid, K, B12).
â­ Potassium iodate, Sodium selenate. Contains Milk and Lactose.

description_en:
Discover the authentic taste with **Humana Original Healthy Snack Biscuits**, the perfect companion for playtime and on-the-go moments. Specially designed to encourage your baby's first self-weaning experience, these biscuits are easy for little hands to hold, granting them enjoyable independence during snack time.

â­â­â­ **Benefits & Features:**
â­ Ideal snack for on the go and in between.
â­ Supports your baby's first self-weaning experience.
â­ Designed for little hands to hold easily.
â­ A delicious and nutritious snack for babies and toddlers.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Humana Original Healthy Snack Biscuits**:
â­ For babies between 6-12 months: **Humana Original Healthy Snack Biscuits** can be easily dissolved into milk or water. Put 1 or 2 biscuits into warm milk or water in a baby bottle. Let the biscuits dissolve for 30 seconds, shake the bottle, and it's ready!
â­ For toddlers 12 months onwards: Can be consumed directly as a snack once the baby is able to self-feed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Humana Original Healthy Snack Biscuits**:
â­ Wheat flour 81%, sugar, sunflower oil, butter, raising agents: ammonium carbonates, sodium hydrogen carbonate, potassium tartrates; natural flavorings, thiamin. May contain traces of soy.
