description_en:
Embark on your baby's culinary journey with the natural and wholesome taste of **Humana Organic Sweet Potato & Fruits Puree Pouch**. We bring you a delicious and nutritious puree crafted from the finest certified organic ingredients, offering your baby a rich taste experience with authentic flavors. Enjoy peace of mind with every meal, as our puree is completely free from added sugar, artificial colors, and preservatives, ensuring your baby receives the best possible nutrition.

â­ Made with 100% certified organic fruits and vegetables.
â­ No added sugar to preserve natural taste.
â­ Free from artificial colors and preservatives.
â­ Gluten-free, making it suitable for babies with sensitivities.
â­ The perfect on-the-go or at-home snack, providing excellent nutrition.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Humana Organic Sweet Potato & Fruits Puree Pouch**:
â­ Can be served cold or warm.
â­ Use a clean spoon to feed the puree to your baby.
â­ After opening, refrigerate and consume within 24 hours.
â­ Before serving, check the temperature of the puree.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Humana Organic Sweet Potato & Fruits Puree Pouch**:
â­ Organic apple puree.
â­ Organic sweet potato puree.
â­ Organic plum puree.
â­ Organic blueberry puree.
â­ Organic prune puree.
â­ Organic lemon juice concentrate.
â­ Antioxidant: ascorbic acid.

#Humana #BabyFood #BabyPuree #BabyFoodie #Organic #SweetPotato #OrganicFruits #HealthyBabyFood #Infants #BabyNutrition

description_en:
Product Description:

Introduce your baby to a delightful culinary journey with **Humana Baby Cereal Wheat With Milk 400g**. Our carefully selected and meticulously processed wheat provides a fantastic and easy taste experience for your little one. These single-grain cereals are perfect for weaning, supporting a healthy introduction to solid food.

Product Features:

â­ Suitable from 6 months onwards
â­ Enriched with essential vitamins and minerals for healthy growth
â­ Contains gluten for developmental support
â­ Content: 400g

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Humana Baby Cereal Wheat With Milk 400g**:

â­ Our Milk Cereals already contain milk, making preparation incredibly easy by simply adding water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Humana Baby Cereal Wheat With Milk 400g**:

â­ Vitamin A, C, D & Zinc contribute to the normal function of the immune system.
â­ Calcium supports normal bone development.
â­ Iron supports normal blood formation.
â­ No added colorings or preservatives (acc. to law).

#Humana #BabyFood #BabyCereal #Wheat #Milk #Weaning #Infant #Baby #HealthyEating #SaudiArabia

**Humana Baby Pudding** offers a healthy and delicious snack with a natural banana flavor, packed with essential nutrients. **Humana Baby Pudding** is an ideal combination of milk and fruit to support your baby's growth. It's the perfect snack at home or on-the-go, requiring no refrigeration for ultimate convenience. 

â­ High source of Calcium for healthy bone development.
â­ Made with 100% natural ingredients and banana puree.
â­ Age-appropriate calories (<100 kcal per cup).
â­ GLUTEN-FREE.
â­ Convenient, no-chill packaging, perfect for travel.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Humana Baby Pudding**
â­ Consume immediately after opening.
â­ Serve as is; no heating or chilling required.
â­ Suitable for babies from 6 months of age.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Humana Baby Pudding**
â­ Skimmed Milk Powder
â­ Banana Puree
â­ Modified Starch
â­ Calcium
â­ Vitamin B1

description_en:
Introducing **Humana 2** follow-on formula, the perfect nutrition for your babyâ€™s growth phase from 6 to 12 months, proudly made in Germany. This GMO-free infant milk features our specialized **ProBalanceâ„¢** complex, designed to provide your baby with all the essential nutrients in age-appropriate amounts, backed by over 65 years of scientific research and experience.

**Humana 2** is crucial for your baby's cognitive development with essential fatty acids for brain development. It also contains all the necessary vitamins, minerals, and carbohydrates for healthy growth. Additionally, it supports gut health with prebiotics and strengthens the immune system with nucleotides. Our commitment to quality and safety means our products undergo up to 600 tests, ensuring the highest standards from our natural farms in Germany.

â­ Made in Germany, GMO-free infant milk.
â­ Enriched with DHA & ARA for brain and nerve cell development.
â­ Contains all essential Vitamins (A, C, D) and Minerals.
â­ Supports the immune system with added Nucleotides.
â­ Excellent source of Iron and Calcium for healthy bones and teeth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Humana 2**

â­ Wash the feeding bottle and all its parts to remove milk residue.
â­ Boil the feeding bottle and all its parts for five minutes and keep them covered.
â­ Boil drinking water for five minutes and let it cool to a suitable temperature.
â­ Pour the required amount of water into the bottle according to the feeding chart.
â­ Use only the measuring scoop provided in the package; level off and remove excess.
â­ Add the correct amount of powder as per the feeding chart.
â­ Shake the bottle well until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Close the package tightly and store it in a cool, dry place.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Humana 2**

â­ Demineralised whey powder (from cow's milk), Vegetable oil (palm, rapeseed, sunflower), Skimmed cow milk powder, Lactose, Palm kernel fat, Potassium chloride, Calcium salts of orthophosphoric acid, Sodium citrate, Calcium carbonate, Oil from the microalgae Schizochytrium sp., Magnesium carbonate, L-Phenylalanine, L-Tryptophan, L-Tyrosine, Vitamin C, Potassium citrate, Nucleotides (Cytidine 5'-monophosphoric acid, Sodium salts of uridine 5'-phosphoric acid, Adenosine 5'-phosphoric acid, Sodium salts of inosine 5'-phosphoric acid, Sodium salts of guanosine 5'-phosphoric acid), Taurine, Ferrous bisglycinate, Zinc sulphate, Vitamin E, Niacin, Pantothenic acid, Cupric sulphate, Biotin, Thiamin, Manganese sulphate, Vitamin D, Vitamin A, Vitamin B6, Riboflavin, Potassium iodate, Folic acid, Vitamin K, Sodium selenate, Vitamin B12.
â­ Contains milk and lactose.

#Humana #BabyFormula #InfantNutrition #HealthyBaby #BabyCare #MadeInGermany #KidsHealth #BabyMilk #SaudiMom #MomLife

description_en:
Discover **Humana Baby Milk Pudding**, the perfect light snack for your baby, combining delicious taste and high nutritional value.

Enjoy **Humana Baby Milk Pudding** in a rich peach flavor, specifically designed to meet your baby's nutritional needs. It contains fruit purees and is an excellent source of Calcium, making it a healthy and delicious snack at home or on-the-go. Thanks to its convenient packaging and no need for refrigeration, **Humana Baby Milk Pudding** offers peace of mind for feeding your baby a nutritious snack anytime, anywhere.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Humana Baby Milk Pudding**:
â­ After opening, consume immediately.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Humana Baby Milk Pudding**:
â­ Contains milk and natural fruit (peach).
â­ Lower sugar content (<100 Kcal per cup).
â­ GLUTEN-FREE.
â­ Suitable from 6 months of age.
â­ No need to chill or refrigerate.
â­ Convenient healthy afternoon snack.

description_en:
Give your baby a healthy start with **Humana Baby Milk Cereal Rice**. This cereal, enriched with essential vitamins and minerals, provides optimal nutrition to support your baby's healthy growth. Perfect as a complementary food for babies aged 6 months and above, it's an excellent choice during the weaning period to help prevent malnutrition. **Humana Baby Milk Cereal Rice** features a delicious rice flavor that babies love, making it a nutritious and enjoyable addition to their diet.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Humana Baby Milk Cereal Rice**:
â­ Wash your hands and the preparation utensils thoroughly.
â­ Boil clean drinking water and let it cool down to a suitable temperature.
â­ Add 150 ml of lukewarm water to the preparation bowl.
â­ Add 45 grams or 9 tablespoons of **Humana Baby Milk Cereal Rice**.
â­ Stir well until a smooth consistency is achieved and feed your baby with a clean spoon.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Humana Baby Milk Cereal Rice**:
â­ Rice flour fortified with vitamins and minerals.
â­ Dried milk.
â­ Vitamins (A, C, D).
â­ Minerals (Iron, Calcium, Zinc).
â­ Natural ingredients - no added colorings or preservatives.

description_en:
Introducing **Humana Kids (4) Probalance**, a complete milk formula meticulously designed to support your child's growth from 3 years and above. **Humana Kids (4) Probalance** milk is proudly made in Germany and is non-GMO, featuring our unique ProBalanceâ„¢. ProBalanceâ„¢ is our promise to provide your baby with all the essential nutrients in age-adapted amounts â€“ based on over 65 years of experience in science and research.

**Humana Kids (4) Probalance** includes essential fatty acids crucial for brain development and cognitive growth, along with all the essential vitamins, minerals, and carbohydrates for healthy development. Our quality journey begins at our natural farms in Germany, where we integrate stringent safety procedures and up to 600 tests to ensure the highest levels of quality and safety in every drop.

â­ Complete milk formula suitable for children from 3 years onwards.
â­ Contains essential fatty acids for brain development and cognitive growth.
â­ Includes all essential vitamins and minerals for healthy growth, including Vitamins A, C, D, Iron, and Calcium.
â­ Proudly made in Germany and Non-GMO.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Humana Kids (4) Probalance**
â­ Wash the bottle and all its parts thoroughly to remove any residue from the previous feeding.
â­ Boil the bottle and all its parts for five minutes and keep them covered until use.
â­ Boil drinking water for five minutes and let it cool.
â­ Pour the water into the bottle according to the amount specified in the feeding table.
â­ Use only the scoop provided in the packaging and level off any excess.
â­ Add the amount mentioned in the feeding table.
â­ Shake the bottle until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Close the packaging tightly and store it in a cool, dry place.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Humana Kids (4) Probalance**
â­ Demineralised whey powder, lactose, vegetable oils (palm, rapeseed, sunflower), skimmed cow milk powder, whey protein concentrate, palm kernel fat, calcium hydrogen phosphate, sodium citrate, potassium chloride, calcium chloride, vitamin C, magnesium carbonate, calcium carbonate, ferrous bisglycinate, potassium citrate, taurine, zinc sulphate, inositol, vitamin E, nicotinamide, pantothenic acid, cupric sulphate, vitamin A, thiamin, vitamin B6, manganese(ll) sulphate, potassium iodate, folic acid, vitamin K, biotin, vitamin D, sodium selenate, riboflavin, vitamin B12.

#HumanaBaby #BabyMilk #KidNutrition #HealthyKids #ChildDevelopment #MadeInGermany #GrowingUpMilk #ToddlerMilk #SaudiArabia #BabyCare

description_en:
Introduce your little one to the pure, delicious taste of nature with **Humana Organic Apple & Pear Puree Pouch**. Crafted with care from controlled and certified organic farming, this puree ensures your baby receives the best of nature, with no unnecessary additives. It's the perfect fruity snack for your baby, both at home and on the go.

â­ 100% Organic Apples & Pears.
â­ No Added Sugar for a naturally delicious taste.
â­ Free from Artificial Colors and Preservatives.
â­ Gluten-Free, making it suitable for sensitive tummies.
â­ A convenient and nutritious organic fruit puree for on-the-go feeding.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Humana Organic Apple & Pear Puree Pouch**:
â­ Open the pouch and serve directly.
â­ Warm the desired amount in a water bath or microwave.
â­ Do not microwave if you are a breastfeeding mother.
â­ Ensure the product is free from allergens.
â­ Discard any unused leftovers.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Humana Organic Apple & Pear Puree Pouch**:
â­ 70% Apple Puree** from organic cultivation.
â­ 30% Pear Puree** from organic cultivation.
â­ Antioxidant: Ascorbic Acid.

#Humana #BabyFood #OrganicBabyFood #ApplePear #HealthyBaby #BabySnack #BabyNutrition #BabyProducts #SaudiArabia #Puree

description_en:
Introduce your little one to the delightful taste of **Humana** Organic Apple & Banana Puree, perfect for babies aged 6 months and up. **Humana** organic pouches are made from 100% organically grown fruits and vegetables, ensuring a delicious, natural flavor without any added sugar, artificial colors, or preservatives. It's the ideal, nutritious fruit snack for your baby, whether at home or on the go.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Humana** Organic Apple & Banana Puree Pouch:
â­ Open the pouch and serve directly to your baby.
â­ Can be served chilled or at room temperature.
â­ Consult your pediatrician before introducing new foods into your baby's diet.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Humana** Organic Apple & Banana Puree Pouch:
â­ 71% Apple Puree**
â­ 29% Banana Puree**
â­ Antioxidant: Ascorbic Acid.
**from organic cultivation.

description_en:
Discover the perfect nutrition for your baby with **Humana 1**, the infant milk specially formulated to support healthy growth from birth to 6 months. Made in Germany, this non-GMO baby milk features the exclusive ProBalanceâ„¢ complex. ProBalanceâ„¢ ensures your baby receives all essential nutrients in age-appropriate amounts, backed by over 65 years of experience and scientific research. It includes essential fatty acids like DHA and ARA for brain and cognitive development, along with vital vitamins and minerals, carbohydrates for healthy growth, prebiotics for gut health, and nucleotides to support the immune system. Quality and safety are paramount at Humana, from our farms in Northern Germany to the rigorous up to 600 quality checks, ensuring the purity and highest standard of every product.

**Product Benefits:**
â­ Infant milk from 0-6 months.
â­ Non-GMO formula.
â­ Contains DHA & ARA for brain development.
â­ Includes all essential Vitamins (A, C, D) and Minerals.
â­ Supports the immune system with Nucleotides.
â­ Rich in Iron and Calcium.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Humana 1**
â­ Wash the bottle and all its parts thoroughly.
â­ Boil the bottle and all parts for five minutes.
â­ Boil drinking water for five minutes and let it cool to the appropriate temperature.
â­ Pour the water into the bottle according to the amount specified in the feeding table.
â­ Use only the provided measuring spoon.
â­ Add the required amount of powder.
â­ Shake the bottle well until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Close the tin tightly and store in a cool, dry place.

**Caution & Warnings:**
â­ Store unopened tin under normal room temperature conditions (not to exceed 25Â° C).
â­ Store opened tin with cover on, in a cool dry place (not in the refrigerator) and use within 3 weeks.
â­ Never use a microwave oven to prepare or warm baby formula.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Humana 1**
â­ Demineralised whey powder.
â­ Vegetable oil (palm, rapeseed, sunflower).
â­ Skimmed milk powder.
â­ Lactose.
â­ Palm kernel fat.
â­ Potassium chloride.
â­ Calcium salts of orthophosphoric acid.
â­ Sodium citrate.
â­ Calcium carbonate.
â­ Oil from microalgae (Schizochytrium sp.).
â­ Choline bitartrate.
â­ Oil from Mortierella alpina.
â­ Magnesium carbonate.
â­ Vitamin C.
â­ Potassium citrate.
â­ Nucleotides (Cytidine 5â€™-monophosphoric acid, Sodium salts of uridine 5â€™-phosphoric acid, Adenosine 5â€™-phosphoric acid, Sodium salts of inosine 5â€™-phosphoric acid, Sodium salts of guanosine 5â€™-phosphoric acid).
â­ Taurine.
â­ Ferrous bisglycinate.
â­ Zinc sulphate.
â­ Vitamin E.
â­ Niacin.
â­ Pantothenic acid.
â­ Cupric sulphate.
â­ Biotin.
â­ Thiamin.
â­ Manganese sulphate.
â­ Vitamin D.
â­ Vitamin A.
â­ Vitamin B6.
â­ Riboflavin.
â­ Potassium iodate.
â­ Folic acid.
â­ Vitamin K.
â­ Sodium selenate.
â­ Vitamin B12.

description_en:
Discover optimal nutrition for your baby with **Humana 2**, expertly formulated to support their healthy growth from 6 to 12 months. **Humana 2** is an advanced, non-GMO infant milk, enriched with the unique ProBalanceâ„¢ complex. ProBalanceâ„¢ is built upon over 65 years of experience and scientific research to deliver all essential nutrients in age-appropriate amounts for your baby. This includes essential fatty acids for brain development, vital vitamins and minerals, prebiotics for gut health, and nucleotides to strengthen the immune system. **Humana 2** is made in Germany with the highest standards of quality and safety, undergoing up to 600 tests to ensure purity and efficacy.

**Benefits:**
â­ Infant milk suitable from 6 to 12 months.
â­ Non-GMO formula.
â­ Contains essential fatty acids DHA & ARA for brain and nerve cell development.
â­ Provides all essential vitamins (A, C, D) and minerals for healthy growth.
â­ Strengthens the immune system with nucleotides.
â­ Enriched with Iron and Calcium for strong bones and teeth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Humana 2**:
â­ Wash the bottle and all its parts thoroughly to remove any residue.
â­ Boil the bottle and all its parts for five minutes and keep them covered until use.
â­ Boil drinking water for five minutes and let it cool to a suitable temperature.
â­ Pour the required amount of water into the bottle as per the feeding table.
â­ Use only the provided measuring spoon and level off any excess.
â­ Add the stated amount of formula powder as per the feeding table.
â­ Close the bottle securely and store it in a cool, dry place.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Humana 2**:
â­ Demineralised whey powder, vegetable oils (palm, rapeseed, sunflower), skimmed milk powder, lactose, palm kernel fat, potassium chloride, calcium salts of orthophosphoric acid, sodium citrate, calcium carbonate, oil from microalgae (source of DHA), L-Tyrosine, Vitamin C (Ascorbic acid), potassium citrate, nucleotides (cytidine 5'-monophosphate, disodium uridine 5'-monophosphate, adenosine 5'-monophosphate, disodium inosine 5'-monophosphate, disodium guanosine 5'-monophosphate), Taurine, Iron bisglycinate, Zinc sulfate, Vitamin E (Tocopherol), Niacin, Pantothenic acid, Copper sulfate, Biotin, Thiamin, Manganese sulfate, Vitamin D (Cholecalciferol), Vitamin A (Retinol), Vitamin B6 (Pyridoxine), Riboflavin, Potassium iodate, Folic acid, Vitamin K, Sodium selenite, Vitamin B12 (Cobalamin).

title_en: Humana 3: The Ideal Growing-Up Milk for Your Toddler (1-3 Years) - 1600g
title_ar: Ù‡ÙŠÙˆÙ…Ø§Ù†Ø§ 3: Ø­Ù„ÙŠØ¨ Ø§Ù„Ù†Ù…Ùˆ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø«Ø§Ù„ÙŠ Ù„Ø·ÙÙ„Ùƒ (1-3 Ø³Ù†ÙˆØ§Øª) - 1600 Ø¬Ù…
description_en:
Introducing **Humana 3**, the growing-up milk expertly formulated to support your toddler's growth and development from 1 to 3 years. Proudly made in Germany, **Humana 3** is non-GMO and enriched with **ProBalanceâ„¢**. This advanced complex ensures your child receives age-appropriate essential nutrients, backed by over 65 years of scientific research and experience. **Humana 3** is rich in essential fatty acids like DHA for cognitive development, along with vital vitamins, minerals, and carbohydrates for healthy growth. It also contains prebiotics to support gut health and nucleotides to boost the immune system.

Our commitment to quality starts at our farms in Northern Germany, where we implement stringent safety measures and conduct up to 600 tests to guarantee a safe and premium product for your child.

**Product Benefits:**
â­ Complete growing-up milk for toddlers aged 1-3 years.
â­ NON-GMO for natural goodness.
â­ Fortified with essential fatty acids DHA & ARA for brain and nerve cell development.
â­ Contains all essential Vitamins A, C & D, and Minerals for optimal growth.
â­ Supports the immune system with Nucleotides.
â­ A good source of Iron and Calcium for strong bones and overall development.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Humana 3**:
â­ Clean the bottle and all its parts thoroughly to remove any residue.
â­ Boil the bottle and all parts for five minutes and keep them covered.
â­ Boil drinking water for five minutes and let it cool.
â­ Pour the required amount of water into the bottle.
â­ Loosely fill the supplied measuring spoon and level it off.
â­ Add the specified amount of **Humana 3** powder according to the feeding table.
â­ Shake the bottle well until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Close the tin tightly and store it in a cool, dry place.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Humana 3**:
â­ Skimmed milk powder, vegetable oils (palm oil, sunflower oil, rapeseed oil), lactose, maltodextrin, whey protein concentrate, skimmed milk powder, glucose syrup, calcium phosphate, potassium citrate, calcium carbonate, calcium citrate, choline chloride, magnesium chloride, vitamins (Vitamin C, Vitamin E, Niacin, Pantothenic Acid, Vitamin B1, Vitamin B2, Vitamin B6, Folic Acid, Vitamin A, Vitamin D3, Vitamin K1, Biotin, Vitamin B12), emulsifier (soy lecithin), iron pyrophosphate, zinc sulfate, copper sulfate, manganese sulfate, potassium iodide, sodium selenite, nucleotides.

description_en:
Provide your baby with ultimate comfort with **Humana Plus**, the specialized formula designed for infants from birth to 12 months who suffer from digestive disorders, colic, or constipation. **Humana Plus** offers a gentle and effective solution to support your baby's digestive health and overall growth.

**Benefits of Humana Plus:**
â­ Special formula for infants with digestive problems including colic, bloating, and constipation.
â­ Non-GMO milk for infants from birth to 12 months.
â­ Reduced lactose content and contains hydrolyzed whey protein for easy digestion.
â­ Contains DHA and ARA for visual and neurological brain development.
â­ Enriched with Iron and all essential vitamins and minerals for healthy growth.
â­ Contains Prebiotics to strengthen immunity and improve digestive health.
â­ Clinically proven to reduce episodes of colic and constipation.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Humana Plus**:
â­ Bring the required amount of water to a boil and cool to 70Â°C.
â­ Pour approximately half the required amount of water into a clean bottle.
â­ Loosely fill the supplied measuring spoon and level off with the back of a knife.
â­ Screw the bottle closed and shake well, add the remaining water and shake well again.
â­ Cool the formula to drinking temperature (approx. 37Â°C).
â­ Check temperature on your wrist before feeding.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Humana Plus**:
â­ Skimmed milk powder, partially hydrolyzed whey protein, vegetable oils (palm oil, rapeseed oil, sunflower oil), lactose, glucose syrup, starch, minerals (potassium citrate, calcium carbonate, magnesium chloride, potassium chloride, ferrous sulfate, zinc sulfate, copper sulfate, manganese sulfate, potassium iodide, sodium selenite), vitamins (Vitamin C, Niacin, Vitamin E, Calcium Pantothenate, Vitamin B1, Vitamin A, Vitamin B6, Folic Acid, Vitamin K1, Vitamin D3, Biotin, Vitamin B12), emulsifier (sunflower lecithin), emulsifier (diacetyl tartaric acid esters of mono- and diglycerides (DATEM)), animal fat (fish oil), essential fatty acids (Docosahexaenoic acid (DHA) and Arachidonic acid (ARA)), Prebiotics (Galacto-oligosaccharides (GOS)).

#BabyFormula #Humana #LowLactose #InfantColic #BabyConstipation #DigestiveHealth #BabyNutrition #BabyCare #SpecialtyMilk #SaudiMoms

title_ar: Ù‡ÙŠÙˆÙ…Ø§Ù†Ø§ 3ØŒ Ø­Ù„ÙŠØ¨ Ø£Ø·ÙØ§Ù„ Ù…ØªÙƒØ§Ù…Ù„ 1-3 Ø³Ù†ÙˆØ§Øª - 900 Ø¬Ù…
description_en:
Discover **Humana 3** toddler milk, the ideal solution for nourishing your little ones from 1 to 3 years old. Made in Germany, it features the unique ProBalanceâ„¢ formula, which is non-GMO and developed based on over 65 years of scientific research to ensure your child receives all the essential nutrients for healthy growth. **Humana 3** contains essential fatty acids for brain development and cognitive functions, as well as vitamins, minerals, and carbohydrates for proper growth. Prebiotics support gut health, and nucleotides boost the immune system.

At Humana, we are committed to the highest standards of quality and safety, from our farms in Northern Germany to your hands, with up to 600 tests to ensure every product meets your expectations.

â­ Specially formulated for toddlers aged 1-3 years.
â­ Non-GMO milk.
â­ Enriched with DHA & ARA for brain development and cognitive growth.
â­ Contains all essential vitamins (A, C, D) and minerals.
â­ Supports the immune system with nucleotides.
â­ Rich source of iron and calcium for bone and teeth development.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Humana 3**

â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparing the milk.
â­ Boil the bottle and all its parts for five minutes and keep them covered until use.
â­ Boil drinking water for five minutes and let it cool.
â­ Pour the required amount of water into the bottle according to the feeding table.
â­ Use only the scoop provided inside the package and level off any excess.
â­ Add the specified amount in the feeding table.
â­ Shake the bottle until the mixture is completely dissolved.
â­ Close the package tightly and store it in a cool, dry place.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Humana 3**

â­ Skimmed milk powder, maltodextrin, vegetable oils (palm oil, rapeseed oil, sunflower oil), lactose, whey protein concentrate, glucose syrup, calcium carbonate, vitamins (Vitamin C, Vitamin E, Niacin, Calcium Pantothenate, Vitamin A, Vitamin B6, Vitamin B1, Vitamin B2, Folic Acid, Vitamin K1, Biotin, Vitamin D3, Vitamin B12), calcium phosphate, soy lecithin emulsifier, fish oil, potassium carbonate, magnesium chloride, zinc compounds, iron compounds, nucleotides, yeast extract, potassium iodide, sodium selenite, copper sulfate, manganese sulfate.

#Humana #BabyMilk #ToddlerNutrition #Kids #ChildCare #SaudiArabia #ChildHealth #HealthyGrowth #BabyFood #InfantFormula

title_en: Humana 3 Baby Milk - 400g | Healthy Growth 1-3 Years
title_ar: Ù‡ÙŠÙˆÙ…Ø§Ù†Ø§ 3 Ø­Ù„ÙŠØ¨ Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø·ÙØ§Ù„ - 400 Ø¬Ù… | Ù†Ù…Ùˆ ØµØ­ÙŠ Ù…Ù† 1-3 Ø³Ù†ÙˆØ§Øª
description_en:
Introducing **Humana 3**, the complete baby milk formula specially designed to support the healthy growth of your little ones from 1 to 3 years old. **Humana 3** is made in Germany and is proudly Non-GMO, featuring our unique ProBalanceâ„¢.

ProBalanceâ„¢ is our scientific promise to provide your baby with all the essential nutrients in age-adapted amounts â€“ based on over 65 years of experience in science and research. This advanced blend includes essential fatty acids such as DHA for cognitive and brain development, along with all vital vitamins, minerals, and carbohydrates for healthy physical growth. Additionally, prebiotics support gut health, and nucleotides contribute to a robust immune system.

At Humana, quality and safety are paramount. **Humana 3** is produced using fresh cow's milk from our own farms in Northern Germany, and our products undergo up to 600 tests to ensure they are safe and of the highest quality.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Humana 3**:
â­ Wash the bottle and all its parts thoroughly to remove any residue from the previous feed.
â­ Boil the bottle and all its parts for five minutes and keep them covered until use.
â­ Boil drinking water for five minutes and allow it to cool to a suitable temperature (approximately 70Â°C).
â­ Pour the specified amount of water into the bottle according to the feeding table.
â­ Use only the measuring scoop provided in the package and level off any excess powder.
â­ Add the specified amount of milk powder as per the feeding table.
â­ Shake the bottle vigorously until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Close the package tightly after use and store it in a cool, dry place.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Humana 3**:
â­ Baby milk suitable for ages 1-3 years.
â­ Non-GMO formula.
â­ Contains essential fatty acids DHA & ARA for brain and cognitive development.
â­ Includes all essential vitamins (A, C, D) and minerals crucial for growth.
â­ Enriched with nucleotides to boost the immune system.
â­ Fortified with Iron and Calcium to support bone health and overall development.

description_en:
Introducing **Humana 1**, the premium infant milk expertly crafted for babies from birth to 6 months. Made in Germany with over 65 years of scientific research, **Humana 1** is a non-GMO formula featuring our advanced ProBalanceâ„¢ complex. This specialized blend ensures your baby receives all essential nutrients in age-appropriate amounts, including crucial DHA & ARA for optimal brain and cognitive development, vital vitamins and minerals for healthy growth, prebiotics to support a healthy gut, and nucleotides to bolster the immune system. At Humana, quality and safety are paramount, with our products undergoing up to 600 rigorous tests to guarantee the purity and effectiveness of **Humana 1**.

â­ Non-GMO milk from 0-6 months
â­ DHA & ARA for brain and nerve cell development
â­ Fortified with all essential Vitamins (A, C, D) and Minerals
â­ Nucleotides for immune system strengthening
â­ Rich in Iron and Calcium for healthy bone growth

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Humana 1**
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly with soap and water.
â­ Clean and sterilize all feeding utensils (bottle, teat, cap) by boiling them for 5 minutes.
â­ Boil drinking water and allow it to cool to 70Â°C.
â­ Pour the required amount of cooled boiled water into the sterilized bottle.
â­ Loosely fill the provided **Humana 1** measuring scoop and level it off. Add the specified amount according to the feeding table.
â­ Screw the cap on the bottle and shake well until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Add the remaining water and shake again until the mixture is smooth.
â­ Cool the bottle under cold running water until it reaches feeding temperature (approx. 37Â°C). Test the temperature on your wrist before feeding.
â­ Store the unopened tin under normal room temperature conditions (not to exceed 25Â° C).
â­ Store the opened tin with the lid on, in a cool dry place (not in the refrigerator) and use within 3 weeks.
â­ Never use a microwave oven to prepare or warm baby formula.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Humana 1**
â­ Demineralised whey powder, Vegetable oil (palm, rapeseed, sunflower), skimmed milk powder, Lactose, Palm kernel fat, Potassium chloride, Calcium salts of orthophosphoric acid, Sodium citrate, Calcium carbonate, Oil from the microalgae Schizochytrium sp., Choline bitartrate, Oil from Mortierella alpina, Magnesium carbonate, L-Phenylalanine, L-Tryptophan, L-Tyrosine, Vitamin C, Potassium citrate, Nucleotides (Cytidine 5â€™-monophosphoric acid, Sodium salts of uridine 5â€™-phosphoric acid, Adenosine 5â€™-phosphoric acid, Sodium salts of inosine 5â€™-phosphoric acid, Sodium salts of guanosine 5â€™-phosphoric acid), Taurine, Ferrous bisglycinate, Zinc sulphate, Vitamin E, Niacin, Pantothenic acid, Cupric sulphate, Biotin, Thiamin, Manganese sulphate, Vitamin D, Vitamin A, Vitamin B6, Riboflavin, Potassium iodate, Folic acid, Vitamin K, Sodium selenate, Vitamin B12.

description_en:
Discover the perfect nutrition for your baby with **Humana 2**, a growing-up milk specially designed for babies from 6 to 12 months. Made in Germany, it's a non-GMO baby milk that contains the unique ProBalanceâ„¢ complex, providing your baby with all the essential nutrients for healthy and balanced growth, backed by over 65 years of experience and scientific research. **Humana 2** features essential fatty acids (DHA & ARA) for brain development, essential vitamins and minerals for healthy growth, prebiotics to support gut health, and nucleotides to strengthen the immune system.

At Humana, quality and safety are paramount. Our milks are produced in our natural farms in Germany, undergoing up to 600 tests to ensure our products are safe and of the highest quality.

â­ NON-GMO milk from 6-12 months
â­ With essential fatty acids (DHA & ARA) for brain and nerve cell development
â­ Contains all essential Vitamins A, C & D, and Minerals
â­ Includes Prebiotics to support gut health
â­ Nucleotides for strengthening the immune system
â­ Iron and Calcium for healthy bones and teeth

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Humana 2**:
â­ Bring the required amount of water to the boil and cool to approximately 70Â°C.
â­ Pour about half of the required amount of water into a clean bottle.
â­ Loosely fill the measuring spoon provided and level off with the back of a knife.
â­ Add the amount of powder indicated in the feeding table.
â­ Screw the bottle closed and shake well until completely dissolved.
â­ Add the remaining water and shake well again.
â­ Cool the formula to drinking temperature (approx. 37Â°C).
â­ Check the temperature on your wrist before feeding.
â­ Close the tin tightly and store in a cool, dry place (do not use a microwave to prepare or warm formula).

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Humana 2**:
â­ Demineralised whey powder, vegetable oil (palm, rapeseed, sunflower), skimmed milk powder, lactose, palm kernel fat, potassium chloride, calcium salts of orthophosphoric acid, sodium citrate, calcium carbonate, oil from microalgae, L-tyrosine, vitamin C, potassium citrate, nucleotides (cytidine 5'-monophosphate, uridine 5'-monophosphate, adenosine 5'-monophosphate, inosine 5'-monophosphate, guanosine 5'-monophosphate), taurine, iron bisglycinate, zinc sulfate, vitamin E, niacin, pantothenic acid, copper sulfate, biotin, thiamine, manganese sulfate, vitamin D, vitamin A, vitamin B6, riboflavin, potassium iodate, folic acid, vitamin K, sodium selenite, vitamin B12.

title_en: Humana 1 Baby Milk, 0-6 Months - 400g

description_en:
Discover optimal nutrition for your baby's growth with **Humana 1 baby milk**. Made in Germany, **Humana 1 baby milk** offers a balanced, non-GMO formula featuring ProBalanceâ„¢, backed by over 65 years of experience and scientific research. It provides your baby with essential nutrients, vital fatty acids like DHA & ARA for brain development, necessary vitamins and minerals for healthy growth, prebiotics to support gut health, and nucleotides to strengthen the immune system. We are committed to the highest quality and safety standards, with up to 600 tests to ensure the best product.

Benefits:
â­ Milk for infants from birth to 6 months
â­ NON-GMO
â­ Contains essential fatty acids DHA & ARA for brain and nervous system development
â­ Enriched with all essential vitamins and minerals (A, C, D)
â­ Boosts the immune system with nucleotides
â­ Contains Iron and Calcium for healthy growth

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Humana 1 baby milk**:
â­ Wash the bottle and all its parts thoroughly to remove any residue from the previous feed.
â­ Boil the bottle and all its parts for five minutes and keep them covered until use.
â­ Boil drinking water for five minutes and let it cool.
â­ Pour the required amount of cooled water into the bottle.
â­ Use only the measuring spoon provided in the packaging and level off the excess.
â­ Add the specified amount of powder to the water and shake the bottle well until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Close the package tightly and store it in a cool, dry place.

Caution & Warnings:
â­ Store unopened tin under normal room temperature conditions (not to exceed 25Â° C).
â­ Store opened tin with cover on, in a cool dry place (not in refrigerator) and use within 3 weeks.
â­ Never use a microwave oven to prepare or warm formula.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Humana 1 baby milk**:
â­ Demineralised whey powder
â­ Vegetable oil (palm, rapeseed, sunflower)
â­ Skimmed milk powder
â­ Lactose
â­ Palm kernel fat
â­ Potassium chloride, Calcium salts of orthophosphoric acid, Sodium citrate, Calcium carbonate
â­ Oil from the microalgae Schizochytrium sp., Choline bitartrate, Oil from Mortierella alpina
â­ Magnesium carbonate, L-Phenylalanine, L-Tryptophan, L-Tyrosine, Vitamin C, Potassium citrate
â­ Nucleotides (Cytidine 5â€™-monophosphoric acid, Sodium salts of uridine 5â€™-phosphoric acid, Adenosine 5â€™-phosphoric acid, Sodium salts of inosine 5â€™-phosphoric acid, Sodium salts of guanosine 5â€™-phosphoric acid)
â­ Taurine, Ferrous bisglycinate, Zinc sulphate
â­ Vitamin E, Niacin, Pantothenic acid, Cupric sulphate, Biotin, Thiamin
â­ Manganese sulphate, Vitamin D, Vitamin A, Vitamin B6, Riboflavin
â­ Potassium iodate, Folic acid, Vitamin K, Sodium selenate, Vitamin B12

title_en: Humana 2: Nutrient-Rich Baby Milk for 6-12 Months (900g)
title_ar: Ù‡ÙŠÙˆÙ…Ø§Ù†Ø§ 2: Ø­Ù„ÙŠØ¨ Ø§Ù„Ø£Ø·ÙØ§Ù„ Ø§Ù„Ù…ØºØ°ÙŠ Ù…Ù† 6-12 Ø´Ù‡Ø±Ù‹Ø§ (900 Ø¬Ù…)
description_en:
Discover **Humana 2**, the optimal milk for your baby's growth from 6 to 12 months. Made in Germany with over 65 years of expertise, it's non-GMO and features ProBalanceâ„¢, a comprehensive complex providing all essential nutrients tailored to your baby's age. **Humana 2** is enriched with essential fatty acids for brain development, vital vitamins and minerals for healthy growth, prebiotics to support gut health, and nucleotides to boost the immune system. We guarantee the highest standards of quality and safety through rigorous testing, starting from our farms in Northern Germany.

â­ Baby milk from 6-12 months
â­ NON-GMO
â­ Contains essential fatty acids (DHA & ARA) for brain development
â­ Enriched with essential Vitamins A, C, D, and Minerals
â­ Supports the immune system with Nucleotides
â­ Rich source of Iron and Calcium

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Humana 2**
â­ Wash the bottle and all its parts to remove milk residue from the previous feed.
â­ Boil the bottle and all its parts for five minutes and keep them covered until use.
â­ Boil drinking water for five minutes and let it cool.
â­ Pour the required amount of water into the bottle according to the feeding chart.
â­ Use only the scoop provided in the package and level off excess powder.
â­ Add the amount mentioned in the feeding chart.
â­ Shake the bottle until completely dissolved.
â­ Close the package tightly and store in a cool, dry place (not in the refrigerator) and consume within 3 weeks.
â­ Never use a microwave oven to prepare or warm baby milk.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Humana 2**
â­ Demineralized whey powder
â­ Vegetable oil (palm, rapeseed, sunflower)
â­ Skimmed milk powder
â­ Lactose
â­ Palm kernel fat
â­ Potassium chloride
â­ Calcium salts of orthophosphoric acid
â­ Sodium citrate
â­ Calcium carbonate
â­ Oil from microalgae (source of DHA)
â­ L-Tyrosine
â­ Vitamin C
â­ Potassium citrate
â­ Nucleotides
â­ Taurine
â­ Iron bisglycinate
â­ Zinc sulfate
â­ Vitamin E
â­ Niacin
â­ Pantothenic acid
â­ Copper sulfate
â­ Biotin
â­ Thiamine
â­ Manganese sulfate
â­ Vitamin D
â­ Vitamin A
â­ Vitamin B6
â­ Riboflavin
â­ Potassium iodate
â­ Folic acid
â­ Vitamin K
â­ Sodium selenite
â­ Vitamin B12

#Humana #BabyMilk #InfantNutrition #BabyHealth #Germany #ProBalance #HealthyGrowth #Vitamins #Minerals #Baby

description_en:
Indulge your skin with **Wadi Alnahl Body Oil Roses Oil**, a luxurious blend designed for deep hydration and superior nourishment. The delicate rose scent envelops you in a refreshing sensory experience, leaving your skin soft, smooth, and radiant.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Wadi Alnahl Body Oil Roses Oil**:
â­ Gently massage a small amount onto clean, dry skin.
â­ Best applied after showering for optimal absorption.
â­ Use daily or as needed for continuous hydration.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Wadi Alnahl Body Oil Roses Oil**:
â­ Natural Rose Oil.
â­ Sweet Almond Oil.

description_en:
Discover the natural power of **Wadi Alnahl Wheat Germ Oil**, an unrefined oil rich in Vitamins E, A, D, proteins, and Lecithin. Its unique properties are ideal for treating skin irritations, softening dry and cracked skin, and combating the effects of wrinkles. Perfect for use in cosmetic formulations for its rejuvenating benefits.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Wadi Alnahl Wheat Germ Oil**:
â­ Apply topically to the skin to treat irritation, dryness, and chapping.
â­ Use for massaging areas with wrinkles to help reduce their appearance.
â­ Can be added to homemade cosmetics to enhance moisturization.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Wadi Alnahl Wheat Germ Oil**:
â­ Pure, unrefined Wheat Germ Oil.
â­ Rich in Vitamin E.
â­ Contains Vitamins A & D.
â­ A source of Proteins, Lecithin, and Squalene.

title_ar: ÙˆØ§Ø¯ÙŠ-Ø§Ù„Ù†Ø­Ù„ Ø²ÙŠØª Ø´Ø¹Ø± Ø§Ù„Ø³Ù…Ø³Ù… 125 Ù…Ù„ - ØªØºØ°ÙŠØ© Ø¹Ù…ÙŠÙ‚Ø© ÙˆÙ„Ù…Ø¹Ø§Ù† Ø·Ø¨ÙŠØ¹ÙŠ
description_en:
Discover the nourishing power of **Wadi Alnahl Sesame Hair Oil 125 ml**, specially formulated to enhance your hair and skin health. This natural oil is rich in essential vitamins, minerals, and proteins vital for hair growth and healthy skin, making it an indispensable addition to your beauty routine.

â­ Deeply nourishes the scalp and hair.
â­ Solves the problem of dry knees and elbows, granting skin softness.
â­ Maintains body moisture and imparts skin radiance and clarity when added to bath water.
â­ Ideal for body massage to soothe muscles and relieve tension.
â­ Helps alleviate menstrual pain and cramps when applied to the lower abdomen.
â­ Treats premature greying of hair when used as a regular massage oil before showering.
â­ Highly effective for treating dry and damaged hair; a few drops provide shine and vitality.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Wadi Alnahl Sesame Hair Oil**:
â­ For Hair: Massage the scalp and hair with **Wadi Alnahl Sesame Hair Oil** 15-20 minutes before showering, then shampoo as usual. Alternatively, apply two or three drops to dry hair as a daily moisturizer.
â­ For Skin: Can be used for body massage after bathing or added to bath water for superior hydration.
â­ For Massage: Use an appropriate amount to massage the body to relieve tension and relax muscles.
â­ For Abdominal Pain Relief: Gently massage the lower abdomen with a small amount of the oil.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Wadi Alnahl Sesame Hair Oil**:
â­ 100% Pure Sesame Oil

description_en:
Discover the power of nature with **Wadi Alnahl Watercress Hair Oil**, the ultimate solution for healthy and strong hair. This effective oil actively prevents hair loss and treats dandruff, stimulating hair follicles for natural growth. Extracted from watercress seeds rich in essential nutrients, **Wadi Alnahl Watercress Hair Oil** provides your hair with the ideal density, strength, and shine you desire.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Wadi Alnahl Watercress Hair Oil**:
â­ Gently massage a suitable amount of the oil into the scalp.
â­ Leave it on the hair for 30 minutes to an hour before washing.
â­ For best results, use 2-3 times per week.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Wadi Alnahl Watercress Hair Oil**:
â­ Pure Watercress Oil.
â­ Essential Vitamins and Minerals.
â­ Natural Hair Nourishing Ingredients.

description_en:
Discover the delightful taste and health benefits of anise tea from **Wadi Alnahil**. This exceptional herbal tea, crafted from the seeds of the Pimpinella anisum plant, is your perfect choice for enhancing overall well-being and enjoying moments of relaxation. **Wadi Alnahil Tea Anise** is renowned for its pleasant aroma and delicious taste, which aids in improving digestion, easing menstrual cramps, and boosting lactation for nursing mothers. It also contributes to maintaining healthy skin and improving oral hygiene.

**Wadi Alnahil Tea Anise** comes in a package containing 30 carefully sealed tea bags to ensure product quality. Its unique formulation assists in regulating menstrual cycles, alleviating labor pain, and relieving complications associated with menopause. Its refreshing fragrance works to clear the mind and soothe the body, leaving you feeling energetic and revitalized throughout the day.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Wadi Alnahil Tea Anise**:
â­ Boil a cup of water.
â­ Place one sachet of anise tea into the boiling water.
â­ Let it steep for 2-3 minutes, stirring gently to achieve the perfect infusion.
â­ Add honey or lemon to taste if desired.
â­ Enjoy your delicious and beneficial cup of anise tea.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Wadi Alnahil Tea Anise**:
â­ Anise seeds (Pimpinella anisum).

description_en:
**Wadi Alnahl Coconut Hair Oil** 125 ml is the perfect solution for deeply nourished and hydrated hair.

Experience natural nourishment for your hair with **Wadi Alnahl Coconut Hair Oil**. It gives your hair perfect body and unparalleled radiance, while maintaining the crucial balance of essential nutrients. Unlike ordinary coconut oils, this oil features a unique formula enriched with time-tested herbs that work to improve the health of your hair and scalp from roots to ends. Give your hair the complete care it deserves, and transform it into vibrant, healthy hair that highlights your natural beauty.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Wadi Alnahl Coconut Hair Oil**:
â­ Gently massage a suitable amount onto the scalp and hair.
â­ Leave it on for a few hours or overnight for best results.
â­ Wash hair with shampoo as usual.
â­ Use regularly to maintain hair health.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Wadi Alnahl Coconut Hair Oil**:
â­ Pure Coconut Oil.
â­ Blend of 8 traditionally tested herbs.
â­ Essential nutrients for hair and scalp.
â­ All-natural ingredients for deep hydration.

Nourish your hair with **Wadi Alnahl Olive Hair Oil 125ml**, the ultimate solution for a healthy scalp and radiant hair. **Wadi Alnahl Olive Hair Oil 125ml** effectively remedies dry, itchy scalp and dandruff. It detangles, deeply moisturizes, and prevents hair loss. Perfect for dry, damaged, and coarse hair, its rich moisturizers nourish to improve elasticity and strength, leaving your hair soft and silky smooth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Wadi Alnahl Olive Hair Oil 125ml**:
â­ Gently massage a suitable amount into the scalp.
â­ Leave on hair for at least 30 minutes or overnight.
â­ Wash hair with shampoo as usual.
â­ Use regularly for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Wadi Alnahl Olive Hair Oil 125ml**:
â­ Pure Olive Oil
â­ Nourishing Natural Moisturizers
â­ Effective Dandruff Treatment Ingredients
â­ Vitamins for Hair Follicle Strengthening

Discover the natural power for your hair with **Wadi Alnahl Hair Oil Black Seed 125 ml**. Black seed has been renowned for centuries for its potent restorative properties across ancient Asian and Middle Eastern cultures. This Black Seed hair oil is brimming with essential vitamins and minerals, providing deep nourishment to your hair. Experience complete hair care with regular use of **Wadi Alnahl Hair Oil Black Seed 125 ml**, as it works to improve shine, enhance texture, and boost hair volume. Unveil the secret to healthy, attractive hair with this unique formula.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Wadi Alnahl Hair Oil Black Seed 125 ml**
â­ Massage a few drops onto the scalp and hair.
â­ Use on damp or dry hair.
â­ Leave-in or rinse as desired.
â­ For best results, use regularly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Wadi Alnahl Hair Oil Black Seed 125 ml**
â­ Pure Black Seed Oil
â­ Enriched with Vitamin E
â­ Nourishing Minerals
â­ Moisturizing Natural Oils
â­ Paraben and Sulfate-Free

description_en:
Discover freshness and health benefits with **Wadi Alnahl Natural Green Tea 30 Sachets**. This tea offers a perfect flavor that adds a distinctive touch to your daily cup, ideal for everyday use with its easy-to-use sachets.

**Wadi Alnahl Natural Green Tea 30 Sachets** features a blend of 100% natural ingredients that gently cleanse toxins from your body without side effects, restoring balance, supporting healthy digestion, and boasting a high level of antioxidants that eliminate free radicals and improve digestion and absorption. Regular use aids in weight loss and gives you a healthy, fit body. Wadi Alnahl experts have developed this high-quality natural green tea to suit your daily needs.

â­ Provides a feeling of freshness and vitality.
â­ Helps eliminate toxins and boost metabolism.
â­ Supports digestive health and reduces stomach bloating.
â­ Rich in antioxidants to protect the body from free radicals.
â­ Contributes to weight management when used with a healthy diet and exercise.
â­ Features an aromatic and delicious taste.
â­ Suitable for vegans and made from natural herbal ingredients.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Wadi Alnahl Natural Green Tea 30 Sachets**
â­ Ideal for consumption in the morning, afternoon, or before bed.
â­ To prepare hot tea, place a tea bag in a cup, pour hot water, and let it steep for 3-4 minutes.
â­ Sugar or honey can be added for sweetness as desired.
â­ For a higher concentration, keep the tea bag in the cup while drinking.
â­ Cinnamon or lemon can be added to enhance the flavor.
â­ Use regularly for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Wadi Alnahl Natural Green Tea 30 Sachets**
â­ Pure Green Tea Leaves.

description_en:
Experience natural refreshment with **Wadi Alnahl Tea Green Tea With Ginger**. This unique blend combines the purifying benefits of green tea with the soothing and invigorating properties of ginger, offering you a daily tea-drinking experience rich in flavor and health. Expertly crafted to bring you comfort and vitality with every cup.

Ginger is renowned for its diverse biological properties, including its ability to combat inflammation and oxidation, making it an ideal ingredient for boosting immunity and resisting cold and flu symptoms. Green tea works to fight free radicals in the body, while ginger supports the immune system, contributing to weight loss and maintaining a healthy, fit physique. **Wadi Alnahl Tea Green Tea With Ginger** is your perfect choice for a healthy lifestyle when combined with a balanced diet and regular exercise.

**Product Features:**
â­ Aids in detoxification and reducing belly fat.
â­ Features a strong, aromatic flavor, perfect for drinking hot without milk.
â­ Supports weight loss and contributes to glowing skin.
â­ Promotes stomach health and aids digestion thanks to ginger.
â­ 100% natural ingredients, suitable for vegans.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Wadi Alnahl Tea Green Tea With Ginger**
â­ Recommended for consumption in the morning, afternoon, or before bed.
â­ To prepare hot tea, place a tea bag in a cup, add hot water, and let it steep for 3-4 minutes.
â­ Sweeten the tea with honey or sugar as desired.
â­ For a higher concentration, keep the tea bag in the cup while drinking.
â­ Perfect for enjoying in winter due to its ginger content.
â­ Add cinnamon or lemon to enhance the flavor.
â­ Regular use ensures the best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Wadi Alnahl Tea Green Tea With Ginger**
â­ Green tea leaves.
â­ Ginger extract.

description_en:
Discover the amazing health benefits with **Wadi Alnahl Pomegranate Tea**. This herbal tea is one of the best options available in the market, combining rich flavor with effective therapeutic properties. The pomegranate drink is characterized by its abundance of Vitamin C, meeting over 40% of your daily needs, which is essential for overall body health. The powerful antioxidants present in pomegranate also contribute to preventing Alzheimer's disease and protecting memory. Enjoy a warm cup of **Wadi Alnahl Pomegranate Tea** for a healthy and refreshing experience.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Wadi Alnahl Pomegranate Tea**:
â­ Boil a cup of water.
â­ Place the pomegranate tea bag in the boiling water.
â­ Let it steep for 2-3 minutes, stirring gently.
â­ Honey can be added to taste.
â­ Enjoy your refreshing and healthy pomegranate tea.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Wadi Alnahl Pomegranate Tea**:
â­ Pomegranate.

description_en:
Discover tranquility and calm with **Wadi Alnahil Tilia Tea**. Also known as Linden, Tilia has been traditionally used to calm anxiety, relieve high blood pressure, and support healthy digestion. This 100% natural herbal blend, carefully crafted from Tilia leaves, flowers, and bark, is designed to promote the well-being of your mind, body, and soul. Make **Wadi Alnahil Tilia Tea** a part of your daily ritual for a deeply relaxing experience. Try it today and feel the difference.

â­ Made from 100% natural ingredients.
â­ Helps reduce anxiety and relieve high blood pressure.
â­ Supports digestive health.
â­ Promotes a sense of relaxation and calm.
â­ Perfect for enjoying at any time of day.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Wadi Alnahil Tilia Tea**:
â­ Boil a sufficient amount of water.
â­ Place the Tilia tea bag in your mug.
â­ Pour the boiling water over the tea bag.
â­ Let it steep for at least 30 seconds.
â­ Remove the tea bag.
â­ Add sugar or milk to your preference (optional).
â­ Sip your warm cup of soothing Tilia tea.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Wadi Alnahil Tilia Tea**:
â­ Tilia (Linden) Leaves.
â­ Tilia (Linden) Flowers.
â­ Tilia (Linden) Bark.

description_en:
Experience the ultimate refreshment with **Wadi Alnahl Green Tea With Mint**, the perfect blend of antioxidant-rich green tea and soothing peppermint. Expertly crafted to support your daily well-being, this tea aids digestion, reduces bloating, and detoxifies your body, contributing to a healthier, fitter you with glowing skin. Its delightful aromatic flavor and refreshing taste, whether hot or cold, make **Wadi Alnahl Green Tea With Mint** your ideal choice for maintaining vitality and a slender physique.

â­ 100% natural ingredients for your daily wellness.
â­ Packed with antioxidants to combat free radicals.
â­ Promotes healthy digestion and reduces stomach bloating.
â­ Aids in weight management and overall body fitness.
â­ Deliciously refreshing mint flavor, perfect for everyday enjoyment.
â­ Vegan-friendly and suitable for healthy diets.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Wadi Alnahl Green Tea With Mint**:
â­ Ideal for morning, afternoon, or evening enjoyment.

â­ Add honey or lemon for enhanced sweetness and flavor.
â­ Keep the tea bag in the cup while drinking for a stronger infusion.
â­ The cooling properties of mint make it perfect for summer.
â­ Use regularly for best results.

description_en:
Experience all-day freshness with **Yardley Men Powder Equity 250 gm**. This luxurious perfumed powder is specially designed for the modern man, offering a refreshing feel and a captivating, long-lasting scent with an authentic English touch.

â­ Fine perfumed talcum powder.
â­ Leaves your skin feeling fresh and subtly scented all day long.
â­ Features credible, high-quality fragrance with an English touch.
â­ Perfect for the active, energetic man, whether at work or on the go.
â­ Absorbs excess moisture and oils, keeping your skin dry and comfortable.
â­ Provides effective protection against body odor with its deodorizing properties.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Yardley Men Powder Equity 250 gm**:
â­ Sprinkle an adequate amount onto clean, dry skin.
â­ Apply after showering or anytime you need a refresh.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Yardley Men Powder Equity 250 gm**:
â­ Talc
â­ Premium Fragrance
â­ Other moisture-absorbing ingredients

description_en:
Elevate your daily grooming ritual with **Yardley London Gentleman Classic Deodorant Body Spray for Men**, a testament to timeless sophistication and modern masculinity.

Designed for the quintessential gentlemen, this range of deodorants encapsulates classic fragrances with a contemporary touch, offering you a symphony of long-lasting freshness and a hint of English charm. **Yardley London Gentleman Classic Deodorant Body Spray for Men** is a masterpiece of scent, opening with fresh notes that seamlessly intertwine with soft floral undertones, finally resting on luxurious woody accords. The complexity of this fragrance is perfectly balanced, making it an ideal choice for the accomplished and elegant man who is always on the move. Embrace a distinct fragrance that not only adorns your senses but also leaves an indelible mark on those around you.

Yardley London, with its legacy of over 250 years, stands as England's most distinguished purveyor of quality perfumes and soaps. A brand synonymous with Englishness, luxury, quality, and natural fragrances, Yardley London has been the trusted choice of the quintessential gentleman.

**Product Features:**

â­ Timeless Freshness: Crafted for the quintessential gentleman, Yardley's Deo Body Spray for men exudes long-lasting charm and sophistication.
â­ Modern Masculinity: Experience the perfect balance of fresh and floral notes, resting on luxurious woody accords for an accomplished aura.
â­ Unforgettable Fragrance: Make a lasting impression with Gentleman Classic deodorant spray for men, a distinct scent to be worn and cherished.
â­ Legacy of Excellence: Trust Yardley London's 250-year heritage for authentic English fragrances and premium body products.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Yardley London Gentleman Classic Deodorant Body Spray for Men**:

â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Spray on clean, dry underarms.
â­ Use daily for long-lasting freshness.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Yardley London Gentleman Classic Deodorant Body Spray for Men**:

â­ Ethyl Alcohol
â­ Butane
â­ Isobutane
â­ Propane
â­ Perfume
â­ Diethyl Phthalate
â­ Propylene Glycol

#YardleyLondon #MensFragrance #Deodorant #Freshness #Masculinity #SaudiBeauty #Gentleman #Luxury #MensGrooming #ArabicPerfume

description_en:
Experience sophistication with **Yardley London Gentleman Elite** Body Spray, a fragrance that embodies the essence of a confident, independent man. It opens with invigorating notes of basil and grapefruit, leading to a masculine heart of pine and vetiver, settling into a warm base of sandalwood, dry amber, and patchouli.

â­ **Yardley London Gentleman Elite** features a timeless blend of hesperidic woody notes.
â­ Enjoy long-lasting fragrance that exudes confidence throughout the day.
â­ Keeps you feeling fresh and helps combat unwanted odors.
â­ Features exquisite fine fragrance notes of sandalwood, dry amber, and patchouli.
â­ An ideal gift that offers luxury without the high price tag.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Yardley London Gentleman Elite**
â­ Spray onto underarm area.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Yardley London Gentleman Elite**
â­ Top Notes: Basil, Grapefruit.
â­ Heart Notes: Pine, Vetiver.
â­ Base Notes: Sandalwood, Dry Amber, Patchouli.

description_en:
Experience freshness and strength with **Yardley London Gentleman Urbane Body Wash for Men**, specially formulated for modern men's skin. This body wash provides deep cleansing for your body, thanks to its active ingredients that protect your skin from harmful bacteria and daily dirt. Enjoy a luxurious, long-lasting masculine scent that gives you a feeling of confidence all day long.

â­ Provides reliable 48-hour antiperspirant protection.
â­ Developed with a leading, long-lasting luxurious masculine fragrance.
â­ Effectively protects skin from dirt and harmful bacteria.
â­ Contains activated charcoal for deep cleansing.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Yardley London Gentleman Urbane Body Wash for Men**
â­ Wet your body with water.
â­ Apply an adequate amount of body wash to your hands or a loofah.
â­ Lather up on your skin to create a rich foam.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ For external use only.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Yardley London Gentleman Urbane Body Wash for Men**
â­ Activated Charcoal.
â­ Gentle cleansing ingredients for the skin.
â­ Luxurious masculine fragrances.
â­ Glycerin for added moisture.
â­ Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Parfum, Charcoal Powder.

description_en:
Experience ultimate freshness and confidence with **Yardley Gentleman Legacy** Deodorant Roll-On. Designed for the modern man, this antiperspirant delivers 48-hour protection against sweat and body odor. Its quick-dry, paraben-free formula leaves your skin feeling dry, refreshed, and subtly scented with an captivating masculine fragrance all day long.

â­ 48-hour protection against sweat and odor.
â­ Quick-dry, paraben-free formula.
â­ Signature masculine fragrance for a touch of sophistication.
â­ Keeps you feeling fresh and confident all day.
â­ Easy-to-use roll-on design for precise application.
â­ 50ml travel-friendly size.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Yardley Gentleman Legacy**:
â­ Shake the bottle well before use.
â­ Apply a thin, even layer to clean, dry underarms.
â­ Allow to dry completely before dressing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Yardley Gentleman Legacy**:
â­ Multi-ingredients for skin care and antiperspirant protection.
â­ Blend of premium masculine fragrances.

description_en:
Unleash your confidence with **Yardley London Gentleman Classic Deodorant Roll-On** for men. This distinct masculine fragrance offers 48-hour protection with a quick-dry formula that eliminates body odour, keeping you fresh and dry all day. Infused with warm woody notes, this blend leaves a lingering sense of sophistication and energy. This product embodies Yardley's rich heritage of delivering authentic English fragrances for the modern gentleman.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Yardley London Gentleman Classic Deodorant Roll-On**

â­ Simply apply to clean, dry underarms.
â­ Use daily for best results.
â­ Enjoy all-day protection.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Yardley London Gentleman Classic Deodorant Roll-On**

â­ Alcohol, Water, Aluminum Chlorohydrate, Propylene Glycol.
â­ Fragrance, Glycerin, Aloe Vera Extract, Licorice Root Extract.
â­ Paraben-free formula.
â­ Quick-dry formula.
â­ Warm and fresh woody notes.

description_en:
**Yardley London English Rose Refreshing Deodorant Body Spray** is your gateway to a world of refreshing and timeless elegance. Immerse yourself in the delicate fragrance of the English rose, the queen of flowers, with a blend of luxurious raspberry essence and a warm sandalwood base. Experience a cool and refreshing sensation that lasts all day, whether you're preparing for a long day at work or a magical evening. This body spray, with a rich heritage dating back to 1770, embodies Yardley's commitment to quality and the extraction of the purest natural floral essences to create unforgettable fragrances. Let the **Yardley London English Rose Refreshing Deodorant Body Spray** be your daily touch of authentic English beauty.

**ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for Yardley London English Rose Refreshing Deodorant Body Spray:**

â­ Shake the can well before use.
â­ Hold the can at a suitable distance from the body and spray.
â­ Avoid direct spraying on the face or near the eyes.
â­ Best used on clean, dry skin.
â­ Can be used anytime of the day for a refreshing feel.

**ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of Yardley London English Rose Refreshing Deodorant Body Spray:**

â­ Pure English Rose Extract.
â­ A hint of Raspberry.
â­ Sandalwood Base.
â­ Refreshing and Natural Ingredients.

#YardleyLondon #EnglishRose #WomensDeodorant #AllDayFresh #LuxuryFragrance #NaturalBeauty #EveningScent #DaytimeFragrance #EnglishElegance #SaudiFragrance

description_en:
Experience modern freshness with the **Yardley Gentleman Fresh Urbane Body Spray for Men - 150 ml**. This body spray offers a unique olfactory journey, blending classic woody aromatic notes with refreshing touches. The fragrance opens with a vibrant combination of bergamot and lavender, providing an immediate sense of invigoration. The heart notes reveal masculine scents of thyme and tarragon, adding depth and sophistication. The base settles into a rich and warm blend of sandalwood, patchouli, and musk, leaving a lasting and captivating impression. The **Yardley Gentleman Fresh Urbane Body Spray for Men - 150 ml** is the perfect choice for the contemporary man who values tradition and high quality in his fragrances.

â­ A refreshing woody aromatic scent suitable for all occasions.
â­ Balanced blend of bergamot, lavender, thyme, and tarragon.
â­ Rich base notes of sandalwood, patchouli, and musk for a long-lasting impression.
â­ Ideal for the modern man seeking distinction and sophistication.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Yardley Gentleman Fresh Urbane Body Spray for Men - 150 ml**
â­ Shake the can well before use.
â­ Spray from a distance of 15 cm from the body.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes.
â­ Best used after showering.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Yardley Gentleman Fresh Urbane Body Spray for Men - 150 ml**
â­ Top Notes: Bergamot, Lavender
â­ Middle Notes: Thyme, Tarragon
â­ Base Notes: Sandalwood, Patchouli, Musk

#Yardley #MensFragrance #BodySpray #WoodyScent #SaudiPerfume #DailyFreshness #LuxuryPerfume #Gentleman #FreshUrbane #JeddahPerfumes

description_en:
Experience luxurious freshness with **Yardley Gentleman Legacy Body Spray**. This fragranced spray envelops you in a delightful blend of refreshing floral citrus and rosey notes. Enjoy a long-lasting formula that's quick-drying and non-sticky, enriched with almond oil, grapeseed oil, and vitamin E to soften and moisturize your skin.

â­ A unique blend of refreshing floral citrus and rosey notes.
â­ Long-lasting formula to maintain freshness all day.
â­ Quick-drying and non-sticky for ultimate comfort.
â­ Enriched with almond oil, grapeseed oil, and vitamin E for skin nourishment.
â­ Package Dimensions: 5.5 L x 14.4 H x 5.6 W (centimeters).

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Yardley Gentleman Legacy Body Spray**:
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Hold the canister 6-8 inches away from the body area.
â­ Spray a thin, even layer onto clean, dry skin.
â­ Allow to dry completely before getting dressed.
â­ Reapply as needed to maintain freshness.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Yardley Gentleman Legacy Body Spray**:
â­ Almond Oil.
â­ Grapeseed Oil.
â­ Vitamin E.
â­ Notes of wood, musk, magnolia, rose, patchouli, and violet.

description_en:
Pamper your skin with **Yardley London English Lavender Moisturizing Body Lotion**. This luxurious lotion is a blend of revitalizing lavender essence, nourishing shea butter, and hydrating Hyaluronic acid, providing deep hydration that lasts all day, leaving your skin velvety-smooth. Enjoy the calming lavender scent that transforms your daily routine into a fragrant and elegant experience, with added germ shield protection for healthier skin. Enriched with the goodness of 10 active floral cells, **Yardley London English Lavender Moisturizing Body Lotion** offers you heritage quality and premium natural fragrances from Yardley London, a trusted name for over 250 years in body care.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Yardley London English Lavender Moisturizing Body Lotion**
â­ Apply a generous amount to clean, dry skin.
â­ Gently massage until fully absorbed.
â­ Use daily for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Yardley London English Lavender Moisturizing Body Lotion**
â­ Pure Shea Butter for intense moisturization.
â­ English Lavender Extract known for its calming and revitalizing properties.
â­ Hyaluronic Acid for deep hydration and moisture retention.
â­ 10 Active Floral Cells for added nourishment.

#YardleyLondon #BodyLotion #SkinHydration #Lavender #BodyCare #SoftSkin #NaturalFragrance #SkincareProducts #SaudiBeauty #Beauty

description_en:
Experience long-lasting freshness with Yardley London English Lavender Anti-Perspirant Deodorant Roll-On.

The Yardley English Lavender roll-on is meticulously created using the worldâ€™s finest natural lavender oils and over 200 years of expertise to provide superior underarm care. Natural licorice extracts with amino peptide subtly lighten the skin and reduce wrinkles, leaving your underarms feeling soft, fairer, and refreshed. It offers effective 48-hour sweat protection, making it ideal for the modern woman seeking all-day confidence.

Elevate your daily routine with this luxurious floral deodorant, a complete solution for your underarm skincare needs, keeping you fresh, reducing wrinkles, and promoting smoother skin. With its 250 years of legacy, Yardley London is synonymous with English luxury, superior quality, and authentic natural fragrances.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Yardley London English Lavender**:
â­ Apply directly to clean, dry underarm skin.
â­ Use daily after showering for best results.
â­ Allow to dry completely before dressing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Yardley London English Lavender**:
â­ Natural Lavender Oils.
â­ Natural Licorice Extracts.
â­ Amino Peptide.
â­ Gentle and effective formula.

#Yardley #Lavender #Deodorant #AntiPerspirant #Skincare #Fragrance #Freshness #Beauty #BodyCare #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Pamper your skin with the **Yardley English Blossom** roll-on deodorant for women, designed to provide long-lasting freshness with a touch of English luxury. This product is infused with the velvety softness of fresh petals, offering an unparalleled pampering experience. Natural licorice extract combined with amino peptides subtly lightens underarm skin and reduces wrinkles, resulting in softer, fairer underarms. With its advanced formula, **Yardley English Blossom** provides effective 48-hour sweat protection, ensuring you stay confident and comfortable all day long.

Elevate your daily routine with the **Yardley London English Blossom** Anti-Perspirant Deodorant Roll-On for Women. It's more than just a deodorant; it's a luxurious experience that envelops you in the velvety softness of fresh petals. What sets this product apart is its unique formula, enriched with natural licorice extracts and amino peptides that work to brighten the skin and reduce wrinkles, leaving your underarms soft and fairer. Enjoy superior 48-hour protection and say goodbye to underarm concerns, embracing newfound confidence. Yardley London, with a legacy spanning over 250 years, is renowned for its quintessential English luxury, and this product embodies the brand's commitment to quality and classic floral fragrances.

â­ Delivers long-lasting velvety softness that boosts confidence.
â­ Subtly brightens skin and reduces wrinkles with natural ingredients.
â­ Provides effective 48-hour sweat protection.
â­ Embodies English luxury and high quality from the House of Yardley.

description_en:
Experience timeless elegance with the **Yardley London English Lavender** Refreshing Deodorant Body Spray. Crafted since 1770, it features pure natural lavender oils that embody calm and sophistication. This scented spray blends floral lavender freshness with deep musk notes for a rejuvenating and invigorating aroma. Indulge your senses in the tranquil allure of lavender for a soothing and revitalizing experience.

**Product Features:**

â­ The essence of calm and sophistication, crafted with pure natural lavender oils for a pleasant smell that lingers all day.
â­ A harmonious fusion of floral freshness and deep musk notes for a rejuvenating and invigorating scent.
â­ Soothes the senses and invigorates the skin with its calming lavender essence.
â­ Timeless fragrances reflecting Yardley's rich tradition of using the finest natural flower essences.
â­ A legacy of over 250 years offering exotic English luxury and authentic floral fragrances.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Yardley London English Lavender**:

â­ Spray onto your skin after showering or as needed.
â­ Shake the can well before use.
â­ Avoid spraying into eyes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Yardley London English Lavender**:

â­ Pure Natural Lavender Oils.
â­ Musk Notes.
â­ Blend of Natural Flower Essences.

#YardleyLondon #LavenderPerfume #DeodorantSpray #WomensFragrance #FreshScent #BodyCare #SaudiArabia #YardleyPerfumes #BeautyProducts #Invigoration

title_en: Yardley London Feather Eternal Body Spray - 150 ml
title_ar: Ø¨Ø®Ø§Ø® Ø§Ù„Ø¬Ø³Ù… ÙÙŠØ°Ø± Ø¥ØªØ±Ù†Ø§Ù„ Ù…Ù† ÙŠØ§Ø±Ø¯Ù„ÙŠ Ù„Ù†Ø¯Ù† - 150 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Discover modern femininity with **Yardley London Feather Eternal Body Spray**.

Made for today's woman, this fragrance is a delicate blend of fresh florals and fruity notes, perfect for everyday wear. Imagine yourself surrounded by the gentle scent of a modern floral bouquet, with hints of rose leaves, red berries, magnolia, dewy freesia, and jasmine. This body spray creates a delightful symphony of floral fragrances. As the scent settles, you'll feel embraced by warm musk, amber, and cedarwood undertones, adding depth to the fragrance. The result? A long-lasting scent experience that boosts your confidence and empowers you throughout the day.

**Product Features:**
â­ MODERN FRESHNESS: Enriched with modern fresh and aquatic notes, offering a contemporary twist on classic floral fragrances.
â­ LONG-LASTING LUXURY: Enjoy the long-lasting luxurious fragrance, ensuring you stay elegantly fragrant throughout the day.
â­ DELICATE YET FLORAL: Indulge in the delicate yet captivating floral scent.
â­ REFRESHING AND ENERGETIC VIBES: Uplifts your spirits with refreshing and energetic vibes.
â­ HOUSE OF YARDLEY: From the House of Yardley, with over 250 years of heritage, delivering premium floral fragrances.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Yardley London Feather Eternal Body Spray**:
â­ Spray on clean skin for a long-lasting fragrance experience.
â­ Perfect for daily wear and special occasions.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Yardley London Feather Eternal Body Spray**:
â­ A blend of rose leaves, red berries, magnolia, dewy freesia, and jasmine.
â­ Undertones of warm musk, amber, and cedarwood.

#Yardley #Perfume #BodySpray #WomensFragrance #Scented #Fragrant #LuxuryPerfume #DailyScent #SaudiPerfume #MadridPerfume

Elevate your daily routine with **Yardley Original Body Spray**, meticulously crafted for the modern man who values sophistication and freshness. This body spray combines an invigorating fragrance with crisp, clean notes, leaving you feeling confident all day long, whether for special occasions or as part of your daily grooming. With its unique formula, **Yardley Original Body Spray** leaves a memorable impression with a perfect balance of subtlety and strength.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Yardley Original Body Spray**:
â­ Spray after bathing or showering for optimal results.
â­ Apply to the body to enhance feelings of freshness and confidence.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Yardley Original Body Spray**:
â­ Fresh and clean fragrance.
â­ High-quality ingredients ensure long-lasting freshness.
â­ Formula suitable for all skin types.

description_en:
Experience luxurious softness with **Yardley English Musk Moisturising Body Lotion**. Infused with the "Flower Power" of natural floral extracts and 10,000 active floral cells per 100ml, it delivers beautifully soft and glowing skin. With over 240 years of expertise, Yardley London guarantees the finest ingredients for deep hydration and an captivating musk fragrance that lasts all day. Ideal for normal to dry skin, it features a unique blend of soothing Cotton Flower Extract, nourishing Shea Butter, and hydrating Hyaluronic Acid to keep your skin moisturized. Natural silk proteins penetrate to restore your skin's vitality, leaving it softer, smoother, and beautifully fragranced.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Yardley English Musk Moisturising Body Lotion**
â­ Apply to your body section by section, starting at your ankles and working up to your neck.
â­ Use enough lotion on your hands to cover each part.
â­ Use a circular motion with light pressure, focusing the pressure on your palms.
â­ Ensure you give each part of your body adequate attention for complete care.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Yardley English Musk Moisturising Body Lotion**
â­ Natural Floral Extracts
â­ Cotton Flower Extract
â­ Shea Butter
â­ Hyaluronic Acid
â­ Natural Silk Proteins
â­ Musk and Flower Blend

#Yardley #BodyLotion #Skincare #Moisturizer #EnglishMusk #Fragrance #SoftSkin #Beauty #SaudiArabia #DeepHydration

description_en:
**Yardley Assorted Floral Talc** Experience unparalleled freshness with our luxurious Assorted Floral Talc powder. Specially formulated to leave your skin feeling refreshed and subtly scented with an authentic English fragrance that lasts all day. Perfect for the modern, active man, this powder effectively absorbs moisture and oil, providing a dry feel and protection against unpleasant odors. Enjoy a smooth texture and an attractive scent with **Yardley Assorted Floral Talc**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Yardley Assorted Floral Talc**:
â­ After showering or any time you need a refresh, apply a generous amount of powder to clean, dry skin.
â­ Use to soften skin and absorb excess moisture.
â­ Can be used as a deodorant powder for odor protection.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Yardley Assorted Floral Talc**:
â­ High-quality talcum powder.
â­ Natural and refreshing floral fragrances.
â­ Moisture and oil-absorbing ingredients.
â­ Active ingredients for odor protection.

description_en:
Elevate your daily ritual with Yardley London's English Rose Perfumed Talc, the embodiment of floral elegance. Designed to envelop you in a soft, delicate scent that lingers throughout the day, it is distinguished by its commitment to skin care.

**Yardley Talc Powder English Rose for Women** is crafted from natural ingredients, leaving your skin silky smooth, offering a fragrant touch of luxury and genuine skin care. Yardley London, a brand synonymous with luxury, quality, and natural fragrances, presents this talc as a testament to its rich heritage.

**ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for Yardley Talc Powder English Rose for Women**
â­ Apply a small amount to clean, dry skin after bathing or as needed.
â­ Gently spread for even distribution and a feeling of freshness.

**ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of Yardley Talc Powder English Rose for Women**
â­ Top Notes: Raspberry.
â­ Heart Notes: Rose, Geranium, Carnation.
â­ Base Notes: Sandal, Musk.

#Yardley #TalcPowder #EnglishRose #Skincare #WomensFragrance #Freshness #SoftSkin #EnglishLuxury #SaudiShopping #FloralPerfume

description_en:
Discover timeless elegance with **Yardley London Gentleman Classic Perfumed Talc**, exclusively crafted for the modern gentleman. This exquisite talc masterfully blends woody notes with white chocolate, enhanced by zesty citrus and spicy accents for an all-day captivating fragrance. Feel refreshed and confident with **Yardley London Gentleman Classic Perfumed Talc**, featuring a unique formula that combats odor and leaves your skin delicately perfumed with authentic English sophistication.

â­ Sophisticated woody accord complemented by a hint of white chocolate.
â­ Mesmerizing blend of citrus and spicy notes creating an aura of sophistication.
â­ Long-lasting fragrance that prevents body odor.
â­ Luxurious packaging embodying the essence of English luxury.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Yardley London Gentleman Classic Perfumed Talc**:
â­ Apply after showering to clean, dry skin.
â­ Sprinkle a small amount onto the chest, neck, back, and underarms.
â­ Gently smooth onto the skin for even absorption and a refreshing scent.
â­ Reapply as needed to maintain freshness.
â­ Avoid contact with the face and eyes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Yardley London Gentleman Classic Perfumed Talc**:
â­ Super Fine Talc
â­ Calcium Carbonate
â­ Magnesium Carbonate
â­ Fragrance
â­ Dipropylene Glycol
â­ Calcium Silicate
â­ Triclosan (Deo Factor)

#YardleyLondon #TalcumPowder #MensFragrance #Freshness #MensGrooming #SaudiMen #Luxury #EnglishPerfume #Gentleman #SpecialOccasions
