title_ar: ÙŠÙˆØ±ÙŠØ§Ø¬ Ø¯ÙŠØ¨ÙŠØ¯Ø±Ù… Ø³ÙŠØ±ÙˆÙ… ÙÙŠØªØ§Ù…ÙŠÙ† Ø³ÙŠ Ù„ØªÙØªÙŠØ­ Ø§Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© ÙˆÙ…Ù‚Ø§ÙˆÙ…Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø¨Ù‚Ø¹ Ø§Ù„Ø¯Ø§ÙƒÙ†Ø© 30Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Uriage Depiderm Brightening Booster Serum 30 ml. This serum, made with 94% of natural ingredients, visibly reduces dark spots, evens and brightens the skin.

â­ Effectively combats dark spots.
â­ Provides a radiance-boosting effect with its light, comfortable texture.
â­ Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin, thanks to its high-tolerance formula.
â­ Visibly reduces dark spots, evens skin tone, and leaves skin luminous.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **URIAGE DEPIDERM Vitamin C serum, anti-dark spot with 20% VITAMIN C, B3, MELA 30ML**:
â­ Apply morning and evening to the face, neck, and neckline.
â­ Use before your regular skincare routine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **URIAGE DEPIDERM Vitamin C serum, anti-dark spot with 20% VITAMIN C, B3, MELA 30ML**:
â­ Features MELA TECHNOLOGY, a 20% Vitamin C complex, and Niacinamide.
â­ Combines the MELA TECHNOLOGY core formula with 100% natural origin ingredients, Vitamin C, and Niacinamide for complete dark spot correction and prevention.
â­ Contains Pea Extract, Uriage Thermal Water, and Enoxolone.
â­ Includes: Aqua (Water, Eau), Propanediol, Butylene Glycol, Diglycerin, Glycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Ascorbyl Glucoside, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Polysorbate 20, Sodium Citrate, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Hydroxide, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Niacinamide, Maltodextrin, Citric Acid, Sucrose Dilaurate, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Pisum Sativum Extract (Pisum Sativum (Pea) Extract).

#UriageDepiderm #VitaminCSerum #SkinBrightening #DarkSpotCorrector #RadiantSkin #Skincare #SkinGlow #Hyperpigmentation #EvenSkinTone #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Introducing **Uriage Power** Deodorant Roll-On, your ultimate solution for powerful 24-hour protection against heavy perspiration. Designed for sensitive skin, this alcohol-free formula effectively soothes and shields your underarm area. It combats excess sweat and neutralizes odor-causing bacteria with its advanced anti-bacterial active ingredients.

â­ Triple action: Fights odor, absorbs excess sweat, and reduces perspiration.
â­ Moisturizing and soothing thanks to Uriage Thermal Water.
â­ Suitable for sensitive skin.
â­ Natural French Uriage Fragrances.
â­ 24-hour anti-odor effectiveness.
â­ Alcohol-free.
â­ Invisible protection, no white marks.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Uriage Power** Deodorant Roll-On:
â­ Apply 1 to 2 times on the armpits every morning after cleansing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Uriage Power** Deodorant Roll-On:
â­ Anti-bacterial active ingredients.
â­ Uriage Thermal Water.
â­ Natural French Uriage Fragrances.

description_en:
**URIAGE GYN-PHY Refreshing Intimate Wash Gel** is specifically designed for the daily hygiene of intimate areas, tested under gynecological supervision to ensure the highest levels of safety and efficacy. This gentle foaming wash deeply cleanses the sensitive area without causing any dryness, maintaining the natural moisture balance and soothing the skin thanks to its soap-free formula and physiological pH (5.5), making it suitable for use from 4 years of age. **URIAGE GYN-PHY Refreshing Intimate Wash Gel** leaves a feeling of freshness and a delicate floral scent, ensuring women feel clean and vital throughout the day.

â­ Gently cleanses and protects the skin barrier with the unique Glyco-gyn complex and Edelweiss extract.
â­ Maintains the natural balance of the intimate area thanks to lactic acid and physiological pH.
â­ Provides a refreshing sensation and a delicate floral scent.
â­ Soap-free and paraben-free.
â­ Tested under gynecological supervision.
â­ High tolerance and safe formula for daily use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **URIAGE GYN-PHY Refreshing Intimate Wash Gel**
â­ Use daily, once or twice a day.
â­ Lather a small amount with water and rinse thoroughly.
â­ For external use only.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **URIAGE GYN-PHY Refreshing Intimate Wash Gel**
â­ Uriage Thermal Water.
â­ GLYCO-GYN complex.
â­ Lactic acid.

#Uriage #WomensCare #IntimateCare #DailyHygiene #IntimateWash #BeautyProducts #WomensHealth #Skincare #UriageProducts #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience ultimate protection and gentleness with **URIAGE Gentle Deodorant Roll-On for Sensitive Skin**. Specially formulated to provide reliable 24-hour protection while respecting your sensitive skin's comfort. This deodorant effectively reduces perspiration without blocking natural processes, combating unpleasant odors thanks to its unique antibacterial formulation. Enjoy freshness and confidence all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **URIAGE Gentle Deodorant Roll-On for Sensitive Skin**:
â­ Apply once or twice to the underarms every morning after cleansing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **URIAGE Gentle Deodorant Roll-On for Sensitive Skin**:
â­ Features specific anti-bacterial active ingredients combined with an anti-enzyme active ingredient.
â­ Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin.
â­ Enriched with natural, refreshing French Uriage fragrances.
â­ Contains 10% Uriage Thermal Water and Bisabolol to soothe and moisturize the skin.
â­ Absolutely safe, free from alcohol and aluminum salts.
â­ Provides 24-hour anti-odor effectiveness.
â­ Moisturizes and softens the skin.

description_en:
Experience purity and refreshment with **Uriage Hyseac Foaming Cleansing Gel**, the ultimate solution for your oily and acne-prone skin. This ultra-gentle cleansing gel effectively removes impurities and excess sebum while respecting your skin's balance. Its gentle foaming texture and light fragrance make it ideal for daily use, leaving your skin clearer, fresher, and healthier.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Uriage Hyseac Foaming Cleansing Gel**:
â­ Lather a small amount of gel in your hands.
â­ Apply to a damp face and body.
â­ Rinse off thoroughly with water.
â­ Use mornings and evenings.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Uriage Hyseac Foaming Cleansing Gel**:
â­ Ultra-gentle, soap-free cleansing action.
â­ Specially formulated for combination to oily skin.
â­ Purifies and deep cleanses the skin.
â­ Hypoallergenic.
â­ Non-comedogenic.
â­ Physiological pH.

description_en:
Experience the purity of nature with **Uriage Thermal Water Spray**. This 100% pure and natural thermal water is a true skincare treatment, rich in trace elements and mineral salts that bestow unparalleled radiance upon your skin. It deeply moisturizes, soothes sensitive and irritated skin, and effectively protects it.

â­ **Product Benefits:**
â­ Moisturizes thanks to its high concentration of mineral salts similar to the skinâ€™s NMF (Natural Moisturizing Factors), offering unique hydrating benefits.
â­ Soothes sensitive skin, thanks to its high content of calcium and magnesium salts.
â­ Protects and reinforces the skin's hydrolipidic film with silicon, while restoring the cutaneous barrier with mineral salts.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Uriage Thermal Water Spray**:
â­ Spray on as often as you feel the need, and leave it on to act. Do not dry or wipe off to boost the penetration of the active ingredients.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Uriage Thermal Water Spray**:
â­ 100% Pure Thermal Water.
â­ Mineral Salts (Calcium, Magnesium).
â­ Silicon.

description_en:
Experience gentle cleansing and lasting comfort with **Uriage Gyn-Phy** Refreshing Intimate Wash Gel. This innovative foaming gel is expertly formulated for the daily hygiene of the intimate area, ensuring a balanced and irritation-free experience. Its carefully selected ingredients work to maintain the natural flora, leaving you feeling fresh and confident.

â­ Gently cleanses without drying.
â­ Maintains the natural balance of the intimate flora.
â­ Guarantees anti-irritation effectiveness.
â­ Offers irreproachable tolerance for sensitive skin.
â­ Hypoallergenic.
â­ Soap-free.
â­ Tested under gynecological supervision.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Uriage Gyn-Phy**
â­ Use daily, once or twice a day.
â­ Lather with water and then rinse abundantly.
â­ For external use only.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Uriage Gyn-Phy**
â­ Features the unique GLYCO-GYN cleansing complex (glyco-esters and glyco-flavonoids of Edelweiss) for gentle cleansing.
â­ Contains lactic acid to help respect and maintain the physiological pH and balance of the intimate flora.

description_en:
Experience the daily essential care with Uriage Thermal Water, a true treatment formulated with rare trace elements and mineral salts, acting as a source of radiance for your skin. This hydrating and soothing spray is designed to effectively calm and protect your skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Uriage Thermal Water Spray**:
â­ Spray directly onto the skin as often as needed.
â­ Leave it on to act without drying or wiping to boost the penetration of active ingredients.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Uriage Thermal Water Spray**:
â­ Rich in mineral salts similar to the skin's NMF (Natural Moisturizing Factors) for unique moisturizing benefits.
â­ High content of calcium and magnesium salts to soothe sensitive skin.
â­ Silicon reinforces the skin's hydrolipidic film and helps restore the cutaneous barrier.

Ideal for:
â­ Face
â­ Body
â­ Sensitive mucous membranes

#Uriage #ThermalWater #SkinHydration #Skincare #HealthySkin #FaceMist #BeautyProducts #DeepHydration #SoothingSkin #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Discover freshness and purity with the **URIAGE DEPIDERM Brightening Cleansing Foaming Cream**.

This rich, lightweight foam, delicately scented, cleanses and purifies your skin, revealing a radiant glow, enhanced by a potent blend of Vitamin C and B3.

**Product Benefits:**
â­ Brightens and illuminates the complexion.
â­ The antioxidant properties of Uriage Thermal Water purify skin, while ACTIWHITE helps even out skin tone and reduce dark spots.
â­ Leaves skin feeling soft and smooth.
â­ Its ultra-creamy base restores comfort and hydration to your skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **URIAGE DEPIDERM Brightening Cleansing Foaming Cream**:
â­ Work a small amount of the cleanser into a lather between your wet hands.
â­ Apply gently to your damp face and massage softly.
â­ Rinse off thoroughly with water.
â­ Use twice daily for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **URIAGE DEPIDERM Brightening Cleansing Foaming Cream**:
â­ Uriage Thermal Water.
â­ Vitamin C for skin brightening.
â­ Vitamin B3 (Niacinamide) for skin tone evening and barrier strengthening.
â­ ACTIWHITE complex to inhibit melanin production.
â­ Hydrating and skin-friendly creamy base.

#Uriage #Depiderm #FaceWash #SkinBrightening #VitaminC #VitaminB3 #Skincare #HealthySkin #SaudiBeauty #GentleCleanser

description_en:
About the Product:

**Uriage Hyseac Hydra** is the ideal care for oily skin prone to dryness and irritation. This high-precision formula provides instant skin comfort, reduces feelings of tightness, and helps alleviate side effects associated with treatments.

Product Benefits:

â­ Soothes immediately: Its rich formula, featuring the patented TLR2 REGUL complex and prickly pear extract, enhances the soothing effect and provides immediate comfort.
â­ Repairs the skin barrier: Thanks to the patented Cerasterol-2F complex, this product helps rebuild and strengthen the cutaneous barrier while respecting its natural physiology.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Uriage Hyseac Hydra**:

â­ Apply once or twice a day to perfectly clean and dry skin.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes.
â­ Tested on acne-prone skin.
â­ For daily use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Uriage Hyseac Hydra**:

â­ TLR2 REGUL complex (Uriage patented)
â­ Prickly pear extract
â­ Cerasterol-2F complex

Suitable for sensitive skin, non-comedogenic, and non-oily.

#Uriage #Skincare #OilySkin #SkinHydration #BeautyProducts #HealthySkin #Acne #Dermatology #RiyadhBeauty #FaceCare

description_en:
Experience ultimate skincare with **URIAGE XEMOSE Cleansing Face & Body Wash**. This gentle, creamy cleansing gel is specifically formulated for the daily hygiene of very dry or atopy-prone skin. Its rich lather gently cleanses while preserving your skin's comfort and restoring its natural balance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **URIAGE XEMOSE Cleansing Face & Body Wash**:
â­ Lather on wet skin.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.
â­ Gently pat your skin dry.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **URIAGE XEMOSE Cleansing Face & Body Wash**:
â­ Uriage Thermal Water: Naturally rich in mineral salts and trace elements, it soothes the driest skin.
â­ Extra-gentle cleansing base with physiological pH: Eliminates impurities from the skin without harshness.
â­ Specific super fatting agents combined with the patented Cerasterol-2F complex: Protect from the drying effect of water and restore skin comfort.
â­ Soap-free.
â­ Fragrance-free.
â­ Suitable for sensitive skin.

description_en:
Discover ultimate sun protection and shine control with **Uriage Hyseac Fluid SPF50+**. This sunscreen is specially formulated for combination to oily skin, offering maximum UVA-UVB protection thanks to an advanced, octocrylene-free filtering complex. Its light, non-sticky, and non-greasy texture ensures comfortable wear. **Uriage Hyseac Fluid SPF50+** provides deep hydration and helps reduce skin dehydration with its active ingredients. Licorice extract contributes to minimizing excess sebum production, giving your skin a long-lasting mattifying effect and helping to prevent new blemishes. Achieve protected, hydrated, and matte skin with **Uriage Hyseac Fluid SPF50+**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Uriage Hyseac Fluid SPF50+**
â­ Apply a sufficient and even amount to the skin before sun exposure.
â­ Reapply every two hours for continuous protection.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Uriage Hyseac Fluid SPF50+**
â­ Provides very high UVA-UVB protection.
â­ Moisturizes the skin and limits moisture loss.
â­ Offers a long-lasting mattifying effect thanks to Licorice extract.
â­ Suitable for sensitive skin.
â­ Non-comedogenic.
â­ Alcohol-free.

#Uriage #Hyseac #Sunscreen #OilySkin #CombinationSkin #Mattifying #Skincare #SPF50 #UVProtection #SaudiBeauty

title_ar: ÙŠÙˆØ±ÙŠØ§Ø¬ Ø¯ÙŠØ¨ÙŠØ¯Ø±Ù… ÙƒØ±ÙŠÙ… ÙˆØ§Ù‚ÙŠ Ø´Ù…Ø³ Ù…Ø¹ ÙÙŠØªØ§Ù…ÙŠÙ† Ø³ÙŠ Ù„Ø­Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ© ÙØ§Ø¦Ù‚Ø© ÙˆØªÙØªÙŠØ­ Ø§Ù„Ø¨Ù‚Ø¹ Ø§Ù„Ø¯Ø§ÙƒÙ†Ø© 30 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Discover superior sun protection with **Uriage DepiSmart Day Cream SPF50+**. This advanced daytime skincare is specifically formulated to reduce and prevent the reappearance of dark spots, thanks to its potent formula enriched with Vitamin C and a regulating depigmenting complex. It effectively shields your skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays, minimizing the risk of hyperpigmentation and promoting a radiant, even-toned complexion. Its high-tolerance formula makes it suitable for daily use, even on sunny days.

â­ Diminishes the appearance of dark spots.
â­ Prevents the reappearance of dark spots with its regulating and depigmenting complex.
â­ Provides high protection against UVA and UVB rays.
â­ Octocrylene-free filtering complex forms an effective barrier against UV radiation.
â­ Suitable for sensitive skin.
â­ Non-comedogenic.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Uriage DepiSmart Day Cream SPF50+**:
â­ Apply daily in the morning to the entire face, neck, and hands, or directly onto dark spots.
â­ Reapply every 2 hours in case of sun exposure.
â­ Use in the evening as a supplementary treatment.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Uriage DepiSmart Day Cream SPF50+**:
â­ Formulated with an advanced blend of active ingredients that work to brighten spots and protect the skin.
â­ Enriched with Vitamin C to boost radiance and reduce pigmentation.
â­ Features a purifying and regulating complex to help prevent dark spot recurrence.
â­ High UVA and UVB filtering complex for optimal sun protection.

#Uriage #DepiSmart #Sunscreen #VitaminC #SkinBrightening #Skincare #DarkSpots #SunProtection #SaudiArabia #Riyadh

description_en:
The **Uriage DS Hair Anti-Dandruff Lotion** is a non-greasy regulating solution for daily use, effectively treating dandruff, scalp inflammation, and reducing itching for an immediate return to scalp health. Your scalp rapidly returns to its healthy appearance and dandruff disappears.

ğŸ”¹ Product Benefits:
â­ Contains Piroctone Olamine, a potent anti-fungal ingredient against dandruff-causing microorganisms.
â­ Features patented TLR2-Regul technology specifically targeting scalp irritation triggered by micro-organisms.
â­ Enriched with Uriage Thermal Water to soothe inflammation and itching.
â­ Cade wood essential oil acts as an anti-scaling ingredient, regulating cell renewal.
â­ Cleanses and purifies the scalp thanks to deep-cleansing active ingredients and Uriage Thermal Water.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Uriage DS Hair Anti-Dandruff Lotion**:
â­ Spray onto dry or wet scalp, row by row. Use twice a day during flare-ups, and once a day as a preventive maintenance treatment.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Uriage DS Hair Anti-Dandruff Lotion**:
â­ Uriage Thermal Water.
â­ Piroctone Olamine.
â­ Cade Wood Essential Oil.
â­ TLR2-Regul Technology.

#Uriage #DandruffTreatment #HairCare #ScalpCare #ItchyScalp #HealthyHair #BeautySaudi #HairHealth #Dermatology #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
Experience immediate relief for very dry and cracked hands with **Uriage Bariederm Cica Hand Cream**. This exceptional barrier cream effectively soothes, softens, and nourishes your skin, acting as a shield against daily aggressors and chemical products. Its innovative formula is non-sticky, quickly absorbed, invisible upon application, and water-resistant for continuous protection. Enjoy soft, comfortable skin with this potent treatment.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Uriage Bariederm Cica Hand Cream**:
â­ Apply as often as necessary to hands.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Uriage Bariederm Cica Hand Cream**:
â­ Aqua (water, eau), paraffinum liquidum (mineral oil), cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 dimethicone, butylene glycol, glycerin, stearyl dimethicone, squalane, PEG-7 glyceryl cocoate, dimethicone, hydrogenated polydecene, mel (honey), PVP, magnesium sulfate, tapioca starch, chlorphenesin, o-cymen-5-ol, polyquaternium-51.

#Uriage #HandCream #ManukaHoney #DrySkin #CrackedHands #HandCare #DeepHydration #SkincareProducts #Beauty #SaudiSkinHealth

description_en:
Introducing the **Uriage Lip Balm**, your ultimate solution for dry and chapped lips. This innovative balm, enriched with Hyaluronic Acid, Shea Butter, and Vitamin C, deeply nourishes your lips and protects them from daily environmental aggressors like pollution, dust, and harsh elements. Its unique formula ensures it won't break or melt, offering comfortable, long-lasting wear.

Product Benefits:
â­ Nourishes and protects dry lips intensely with Shea Butter, shielding them from external damage.
â­ Repairs damaged and weakened lips with Borage Oil, restoring their vitality and health.
â­ Offers protection against environmental aggressors and fights free radicals.
â­ Hypoallergenic, making it suitable for sensitive skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Uriage Lip Balm**:
â­ Apply as often as necessary. For best results and continuous hydration, use at least 2 to 3 times daily.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Uriage Lip Balm**:
â­ Hyaluronic Acid: For deep hydration and lip plumping.
â­ Shea Butter: For intense nourishment and superior protection.
â­ Vitamin C: An antioxidant that helps protect and rejuvenate lips.
â­ Borage Oil: For repairing damaged lips.

#Uriage #LipBalm #LipCare #HydratedLips #HealthyLips #SheaButter #HyaluronicAcid #VitaminC #DeepHydration #SaudiBeauty
